verse.content: Ɛsiane sɛ nnipa pii afa ato wɔn ho so sɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ nsɛm a aba mu wɔ yɛn ntam no nnidisoɔ nnidisoɔ,
sɛdeɛ wɔn a wɔfiri mfitiaseɛ de wɔn ani hunuiɛ na wɔyɛɛ asɛm no ho asomfoɔ no de abrɛ yɛn no nti,
Onimuonyamfoɔ kɛse Teofilo, ɛyɛɛ me sɛ, ɛyɛ sɛ me nso, mahwehwɛ ne nyinaa mu pɛpɛɛpɛ firi mfitiaseɛ no, metwerɛ no nnidisoɔ nnidisoɔ mebrɛ woɔ,
na woahunu sɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ woɔ no yɛ nokorɛ.
Yudahene Herode berɛ so no, ɔsɔfoɔ bi tenaa ase a wɔfrɛ no Sakaria a ɔfiri Abia asɔfokuo mu, na ne yere yɛ Aaron mmammaa no mu bi a wɔfrɛ no Elisabet.
Na wɔn baanu nyinaa tene wɔ Nyankopɔn anim di Awurade ahyɛdeɛ ne teneneedeɛ nyinaa so a ɛho nni asɛm,
nanso wɔnni ba, ɛfiri sɛ na Elisabet yɛ obonini, na wɔn baanu nyinaa anyinyini pa ara!
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɛduruu n’asɔfokuo so na ɔreyɛ n’asɔfodwuma wɔ Nyankopɔn anim no,
sɛdeɛ asɔfodwuma no teɛ no, ɛduruu ne so sɛ ɔkɔ Awurade asɔredan mu kɔhye ohwam.
Na ɔrehye ohwam no, na nnipakuo no nyinaa gyina adihɔ rebɔ mpaeɛ.
Na Awurade bɔfoɔ bi bɛyii ne ho kyerɛɛ no, na ɔbɛgyinaa ohwam afɔrebukyia no nifa.
Na Sakaria hunuu no no, n’akoma tui, na ehu kaa no.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no see no sɛ: Sakaria, nsuro, na wɔatie wo mpaebɔ, na wo yere Elisabet bɛwo ɔbabarima ama wo, na woato ne din Yohane.

block_quote.content: Na ɛbɛyɛ wo anigyeɛ ne ahosan,
na n’awoɔ nti nnipa bebree ani bɛgye.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ Awurade anim,
na ɔrennom bobesa anaa nsa biara,
na Honhom Kronkron bɛhyɛ no ma
afiri ne na yam mpo.
Na ɔbɛdane Israel mma mu bebree aba Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn, nkyɛn.
Na ɔde Elia honhom ne ahoɔden bɛdi n’anim
akɔdane agyanom akoma aba wɔn mma so
ne asoɔdenfoɔ akɔ teneneefoɔ adwene ho,
na wasiesie ɔman a wɔaboaboa wɔn ho no de ama Awurade.

verse.content: Na Sakaria see ɔbɔfoɔ no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na mede bɛhunu yei? Ɛfiri sɛ mabɔ akora, na me yere nso abɔ aberewa.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no bua see no sɛ: Mene Gabriel a megyina Nyankopɔn anim, na wɔasoma me sɛ memmɛkasa menkyerɛ wo, na menka wo nsɛmpa yi.
Na hwɛ, wobɛtɔre mum, na worentumi nkasa de bɛkɔ akɔsi da a yeinom bɛba mu, ɛfiri sɛ, woannye me nsɛm a ɛbɛba mu ne berɛ mu no anni.
Na nkurɔfoɔ no retwɛn Sakaria; na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa sɛ wakyɛre asɔredan mu hɔ saa.
Na ɔfirii adie no, wantumi ankasa ankyerɛ wɔn; na wɔhunuu sɛ wanya anisoadehunu bi wɔ asɔredan mu hɔ; na ɔno deɛ, ɔde ne nsa yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, na wantumi ankasa.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ne som nna wiee duro no, ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ ne fie.
Na nna yi akyiri no, ne yere Elisabet nyinsɛnee, na ɔde ne ho siee abosome nnum kaa sɛ:
Sɛdeɛ Awurade ayɛ me, nna a wabɛhwɛ me sɛ ɔbɛyi m’ahohora afiri nnipa mu no mu ni.
Na bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia no mu no, Onyankopɔn somaa Ɔbɔfoɔ Gabriel kɔɔ Galilea kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Nasaret mu,
ababaa bi a wɔde no ama ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Dawid abusua mu awadeɛ nkyɛn; na ababaa no din de Maria.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Ei, ma w’ani nnye, wo a wɔadom woɔ! Awurade ka wo ho.
Na n’akoma tuu n’asɛm no ho, na ɔdwenee ho sɛ: Nkyea bɛn ni?
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no see no sɛ: Nsuro, Maria, na woanya Nyankopɔn hɔ adom.
Na hwɛ, wobɛnyinsɛn, na woawo ɔbabarima, na woato ne din Yesu.

block_quote.content: Ɔbɛyɛ ɔkɛseɛ, na wɔafrɛ no deɛ Ɔwɔ Sorosoro no Ba;
na Awurade Nyankopɔn de n’agya Dawid ahennwa bɛma no.
Na ɔbɛdi Yakob fie so hene daapem, na n’ahennie no to rentwa da.

verse.content: Na Maria see ɔbɔfoɔ no sɛ: Yei bɛyɛ dɛn na aba mu, ɛfiri sɛ mennim ɔbarima biara?
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no bua see no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Honhom Kronkron no bɛba wo so,
na Deɛ Ɔwɔ Sorosoro no ahoɔden abɛkata wo so;
enti na ade kronkron a wobɛwoɔ no, wɔbɛfrɛ no
Nyankopɔn ba.

verse.content: Na hwɛ, wo busuani Elisabet nso anyinsɛn ɔbabarima ne mmerewa berɛ mu; na deɛ wɔfrɛ no obonini no, yei ne ne bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia;
ɛfiri sɛ Nyankopɔn fam deɛ, biribiara nni hɔ a ɛrentumi nyɛ hɔ.
Ɛnna Maria se: Hwɛ, Awurade afenaa ne me; ɛnyɛ mma me sɛdeɛ w’asɛm seɛ. Na ɔbɔfoɔ no gyaa no hɔ kɔe.
Na nna no mu ara, Maria de ahoɔherɛ sɔre kɔɔ mmepɔ so Yuda kuro no mu,
na ɔkɔɔ Sakaria fie kɔkyeaa Elisabet.
Na ɛbaa sɛ Elisabet tee Maria nkyea no, akɔkoaa no hurii ne yam; na Honhom Kronkron hyɛɛ Elisabet ma,
na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Wɔahyira wo mmaa mu, na wɔahyira wo yam adeɛ!
Na yei firi he sɛ m’Awurade ne na reba me nkyɛn yi?
Na hwɛ, wo nkyea twaa m’aso mu ara pɛ, akɔkoaa no de ahosan hurii me yam.
Na nhyira ne deɛ wagye adie, ɛfiri sɛ nsɛm a Awurade ama wɔabɛka akyerɛ no no bɛba mu.

block_quote.content: Na Maria kaa sɛ:
Me kra, kamfo Awurade,
na m’agyenkwa Nyankopɔn ho na me honhom ho asane no;
ɛfiri sɛ wahwɛ n’afenaa ohia asetena.
Na hwɛ, ɛfiri nnɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa bɛfrɛ me nhyira;
ɛfiri sɛ Otumfoɔ no ayɛ adeɛ kɛseɛ ama me,
na ne din ne kronkron,
na ne mmɔborɔhunu wɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no so,
awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ nyinaa mu.
Ɔde ne basa ayɛ ahoɔdenneɛ;
wapansam wɔn a wɔyɛ ahantan wɔn akoma nsusuiɛ mu.
Watu atumfoɔ afiri wɔn nhennwa so
na wapagya ahiafoɔ.
Ɔde nnepa ahyɛ wɔn a ɛkɔm de wɔn ma,
na wagya ahonyafoɔ kwan yafumpan.
Wasɔ n’akoa Israel mu,
sɛ ɔde bɛkae ne mmɔborɔhunu,
sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn agyanom no,
ama Abraham ne n’asefoɔ daa.

verse.content: Na Maria tenaa Elisabet nkyɛn bɛyɛ abosome mmiɛnsa; na ɔsane kɔɔ ne fie.
Elisabet awoɔ duruu so, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima.
Na n’afipamfoɔ ne n’abusuafoɔ tee sɛdeɛ Awurade ayɛ no adɔeɛ kɛseɛ no, wɔne no ani gyee.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ne nnawɔtwe soɔ no, wɔbaa sɛ wɔrebɛtwa abɔfra no twetia. Na anka wɔde no reto n’agya Sakaria,
nanso ne na kaa sɛ: Dabi, wɔmfrɛ no Yohane.
Na wɔsee no sɛ: Obiara nni w’abusua mu a wɔfrɛ no saa.
Na wɔde nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bisaa n’agya edin a ɔpɛ sɛ wɔde to no.
Na ɔgyee twerɛpono ketewa bi twerɛɛ so sɛ: Ne din ne Yohane. Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa nwanwa.
Na n’ano buee, na ne tɛkyerɛma homa sanee amonom hɔ ara, na ɔkasa yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
Na ehu kaa wɔn a wɔatwa wɔn ho ahyia no nyinaa, na wɔkekaa nsɛm yi nyinaa wɔ Yudea mmepɔ so nkuro nyinaa mu.
Na wɔn a wɔteeɛ nyinaa de siee wɔn akoma mu kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ara na abɔfra yi rebɛyɛ? Hwɛ, Awurade nsa wɔ ne so.
Na n’agya Sakaria deɛ, Honhom Kronkron ahyɛ no ma, na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn,
ɛfiri sɛ wabɛhwɛ na wagye ne man;
na wama nkwagyeɛ abɛn so ama yɛn
n’akoa Dawid fie,
sɛdeɛ ɔde n’adiyifoɔ kronkron a wɔwɔ hɔ firi teteete no ano kaeɛ no,
sɛ wɔnnye yɛn mfiri yɛn atamfoɔ ne wɔn a wɔkyiri yɛn nyinaa nsam;
sɛ ɔbɛhu yɛn agyanom mmɔbɔ,
na wakae n’apam kronkron no:
Ntam a ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn agya Abraham
sɛ ɔbɛma wɔayi yɛn afiri yɛn atamfoɔ nsam,
na yɛasom no a ehu nni mu,
ahoteɛ ne tenenee mu
wɔ n’anim, yɛn nna nyinaa.
Na wo, abɔfra yi, wɔbɛfrɛ wo Ɔsorosoroni no diyifoɔ;
ɛfiri sɛ wobɛdi Awurade anim akɔsiesie n’akwan,
na wode nkwagyeɛ ho nimdeɛ ama ne man,
wɔ wɔn bɔne fakyɛ a
ɛfiri yɛn Nyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunu a ɛmaa ne yam hyehyee no no mu.
Ɛno nti na adekyeeɛ a ɛfiri soro abɛpue yɛn soɔ,
sɛ ɛbɛhyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔtete sum mu ne owuo sunsum aseɛ,
na wagye yɛn taataa akɔ asomdwoeɛ kwan so.

verse.content: Na abɔfra no nyiniiɛ, na ɔnyaa honhom mu ahoɔden; na ɔtenaa serɛ so de kɔduruu da a ɔde ne ho kɔkyerɛɛ Israel.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ foforɔ a wɔgye to mu no bi de
Wo a wɔahyira wo mmaa mu!

verse.content: Nna no mu no, mmara bi firi Kaesare Augusto nkyɛn baa sɛ wɔnkan wiasefoɔ nyinaa, ntwerɛ wɔn din.
Yei ne ɔkan a ɛdi kan berɛ a na Kirenio yɛ Siria amrado no.
Na nnipa nyinaa kɔɔ wɔn kurom kɔtwerɛɛ wɔn din.
Na Yosef nso firii Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galilea sii mu kɔɔ Yudea, Dawid kuro a wɔfrɛ no Betlehem mu, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔfiri Dawid fie ne n’abusua mu,
kɔtwerɛɛ ɔno ne n’asiwa yere Maria a n’awoɔ abɛn no din.
Na wɔwɔ hɔ no, n’awoɔ duruu so,
na ɔwoo n’abakan barima, na ɔde ntoma kyekyeree no, na ɔde no too mmoa adididaka mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔannya kwan ahɔhodan no mu.
Na nnwanhwɛfoɔ bi wɔ saa asase no so da wiram rewɛn wɔn nnwankuo anadwo.
Na Awurade bɔfoɔ bɛgyinaa wɔn nkyɛn, na Awurade animuonyam hran twaa wɔn ho hyiae, na ehu kɛseɛ kaa wɔn.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no see wɔn sɛ: Monnsuro, na hwɛ, mede asɛmpa a ɛyɛ anigyeɛ pii na ɛbɛyɛ aman nyinaa dea merebrɛ mo,
sɛ nnɛ wɔawo Agyenkwa a ɔne Kristo, Awurade no, ama mo wɔ Dawid kurom.
Na yei ne mo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ: Mobɛhunu akɔkoaa a wɔde ntoma akyekyere no sɛ ɔda mmoa adididaka mu.
Na mpofirim ara ɔsoro asafo bebree bɛkaa ɔbɔfoɔ no ho yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ:

block_quote.content: Animuonyam nka Onyankopɔn wɔ sorosoro,
na asomdwoeɛ nka nnipa a wɔsɔ n’ani wɔ asase so.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ abɔfoɔ no firii wɔn nkyɛn kɔɔ soro no, nnwanhwɛfoɔ no keka kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ: Momma yɛnkɔ Betlehem, na yɛnkɔhwɛ asɛm a aba a Awurade ayi akyerɛ yɛn yi ɛ!
Na wɔkɔɔ no ntɛm so, na wɔkɔhunuu Maria ne Yosef ne akɔkoaa no sɛ ɔda mmoa adididaka no mu.
Na wɔhunuu no no, wɔkaa abɔfra no ho asɛm a wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
Na deɛ nnwanhwɛfoɔ no kaeɛ no yɛɛ wɔn a wɔteeɛ nyinaa nwanwa.
Na Maria deɛ, ɔde nsɛm yi nyinaa sieeɛ, na ɔdwenee ho n’akoma mu.
Na nnwanhwɛfoɔ no sane kɔe kɔhyɛɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam, na wɔyii no ayɛ wɔ deɛ wɔteeɛ na wɔkɔhunuiɛ sɛdeɛ wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa nti.
Na ɔdii nnawɔtwe a wɔrebɛtwa no twetia no, wɔtoo ne din Yesu sɛdeɛ ɔbɔfoɔ no kyerɛeɛ ansa na wɔrenyinsɛn no ɔyafunu mu no.
Na wɔn ahodwira nna duruiɛ sɛdeɛ Mose mmara seɛ no, wɔde no kɔɔ Yerusalem sɛ wɔde no rekɔma Awurade
(sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ Awurade mmara mu sɛ: Ɔbarima biara a ɔbɛbue yafunu ano no, wɔbɛfrɛ no kronkron ama Awurade,)
na wɔakɔbɔ afɔdeɛ sɛdeɛ wɔaka wɔ Awurade mmara mu no: Anyankuku mmienu anaa mmorɔnoma mma mmienu.
Na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi wɔ Yerusalem a wɔfrɛ no Simeon; saa onipa yi tene, ɔsuro Nyame, na ɔretwɛn Israel awerɛkyekyerɛ no, na Honhom Kronkron wɔ ne so.
Na Honhom Kronkron no ayi akyerɛ no sɛ ɔrenhunu owuo, gye sɛ wahunu Kristo a ɔyɛ Awurade deɛ no ansa.
Na Honhom no maa no kɔɔ asɔrefie hɔ; na abɔfra Yesu awofoɔ no de no baa sɛ wɔrebɛyɛ sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ ama no no,
ɔfaa no too n’abasa so, na ɔyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ na afei ɔkaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Awurade, afei woregya w’akoa kwan asomdwoeɛ mu
sɛdeɛ w’asɛm seɛ;
ɛfiri sɛ m’ani ahunu wo nkwagyeɛ
a woasiesie wɔ aman nyinaa anim,
kanea a ɛbɛma amanaman so ateɛ
na ɛbɛhyɛ wo man Israel animuonyam.

verse.content: Na deɛ wɔkaa no ne ho no yɛɛ n’agya ne ne na nwanwa.
Na Simeon hyiraa wɔn, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne na Maria sɛ: Hwɛ, abɔfra yi na wɔde no asi hɔ ama Israel nnipa bebree ahweaseɛ ne wɔn sɔreɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a wɔbɛkasa atia no,
na wo nso, afena bɛhwire wo ara wo kra mu, na akoma bebree mu nsusuiɛ ada adi.
Na odiyifoɔ baa bi a wɔfrɛ no Hana wɔ hɔ. Ɔyɛ Fanuel ba a ɔfiri Aser abusuakuo mu. Wanyini, na ɔwaree ne mmabaaberɛ mu ne ne kunu tenaa mfirinhyia nson.
Na ɔyɛ okunafoɔ a wadi bɛyɛ mfirinhyia aduɔwɔtwe nnan, na ɔmpa asɔrefie hɔ da, na ɔde mmuada ne mpaebɔ som Onyankopɔn adesaeɛ ne adekyeeɛ.
Na dɔn no ara mu, ɔno nso bɛgyinaa hɔ bi yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ saa ara, na ɔkaa ne ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔretwɛn ɔgyeɛ a wɔbɛgye Yerusalem no nyinaa.
Na wɔwiee amanneɛ nyinaa yɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade mmara kyerɛ no, wɔsane kɔɔ wɔn kuro Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galilea mu.
Na abɔfra no nyiniiɛ, na ɔyɛɛ nnam, na nyansa yɛɛ no ma, na Nyankopɔn adom wɔ ne so.
Na n’awofoɔ kɔ Yerusalem daa afirinhyia Twam afahyɛ ase.
Na ɔdii mfirinhyia dummienu no, wɔkɔe sɛdeɛ afahyɛ no ho amanneɛ teɛ.
Na wɔdii nna no wieeɛ, na wɔresane aba no, abɔfra Yesu no kaa akyire wɔ Yerusalem, nanso na n’awofoɔ nnim.
Na wɔsusuu sɛ wafra nnipakuo no mu nti, wɔkɔɔ da koro kwan, na wɔhwehwɛɛ no wɔn abusuafoɔ ne amannifoɔ mu.
Na wɔanhu no no, wɔsane baa Yerusalem bɛhwehwɛɛ no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ne nnansa soɔ no, wɔkɔhunuu no wɔ asɔrefie sɛ ɔte akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ntam retie wɔn na ɔrebisabisa wɔn nsɛm.
Na wɔn a wɔtiee no nyinaa, ne nyansa ne ne mmuaeɛ yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa.
Na wɔhunuu no no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri, na ne na see no sɛ: Ɔba, adɛn na woayɛ yɛn sɛɛ yi? Hwɛ, me ne w’agya de ahoyera na ahwehwɛ woɔ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na mohwehwɛ me? Monnim sɛ ɛsɛ me sɛ metena m’agya fie?

verse.content: Na wɔn deɛ, wɔante asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no ase.
Na ɔne wɔn sii mu sane kɔɔ Nasaret, na ɔbrɛɛ ne ho ase maa wɔn. Na ne na de nsɛm yi nyinaa siee n’akomam.
Na Yesu nyinii nyansa ne kɛseyɛ ne Nyankopɔn ne nnipa nkyɛn adom mu.

Na Kaesare Tiberio ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so dunum mu no, na Pontio Pilato di Yudea amrado, na Herode di Galilea mansinihene, na ne nua Filipo di Iturea ne Trakoniti asase so, na Lisania di Abilene mansinihene,
na Hana ne Kaiafa yɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no, Nyankopɔn asɛm baa Sakaria ba Yohane nkyɛn serɛ so.
Na ɔbaa Yordan ho asase nyinaa so bɛkaa adwensakyera asubɔ a ɛde kɔ bɔne fakyɛ mu,
sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nsɛm nwoma mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Obi nne retea mu serɛ so sɛ:
Monsiesie Awurade kwan!
Momma n’atempɔn ntene!
Wɔbɛhyɛ abɔn nyinaa ma,
na wɔabrɛ mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ nyinaa ase;
na deɛ akyea no bɛtene,
na akwan mmonkyimmɔnka ayɛ tonomtonom.
Na honam nyinaa bɛhunu Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo a wɔfiri baa sɛ ɔmmɔ wɔn asu no sɛ: Nhuritia mma! Hwan na ɔbɔɔ mo kɔkɔ sɛ monnwane mfiri abufuo a ɛreba no ho?
Na afei monso aba a ɛfata adwensakyera, na mommfiri aseɛ nnka no mo mu sɛ: Yɛn agya ne Abraham; na mese mo sɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛtumi anyane mma afiri aboɔ yi mu ama Abraham.
Nanso wɔde akuma no ato nnua nhini no ho dada sɛ dua biara a ɛnso aba pa no, wɔbɛtwa ato ogya mu.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no bisaa no sɛ: Na yɛnyɛ dɛn?
Na ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ: Deɛ ɔwɔ ntadeɛ mmienu no, ma no nkyɛ mu mma deɛ ɔnni bie bi, na deɛ ɔwɔ aduane no, ma no nyɛ saa ara.
Na togyefoɔ nso baa sɛ ɔmmɔ wɔn asu, na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ɛdeɛn na yɛnyɛ?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnnye nnkyɛne deɛ wɔatwa ato hɔ no.
Na asraafoɔ nso bisaa no sɛ: Yɛn nso yɛnyɛ dɛn? Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnyɛ obiara haihai, nso monntoto obi ano kwa, na momma mo akatua nsɔ mo ani.
Na ɛsiane sɛ ɔman no hwɛ kwan, na wɔn nyinaa susu wɔn akoma mu sɛ ebia Yohane ne Kristo no nti,
Yohane kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn nyinaa sɛ: Me deɛ, mede nsuo na mebɔ mo asu; na deɛ ne ho yɛ den sene me reba a mensɛ sɛ mesane ne mpaboa homa. Ɔno na ɔde Honhom Kronkron ne ogya bɛbɔ mo asu.
Ɔno na ne nhusoɔ apaawa kuta ne nsam, na ɔbɛpra n’aporeeɛ hɔ fitaa, na waboaboa ayuo no ano agu ne san so, na ntɛtɛ no deɛ, ɔde ogya a ɛnnum da bɛhye.
Na nnoɔma pii nso ka ho a ɔde tuu ɔman no fo kaa asɛmpa kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na ɔmansinihene Herode, ne nua yere Herodia ho bɔne a wayɛ na Yohane kaa n’anim nti,
ɔde yei kaa ne nyinaa ho de Yohane too afiase.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔbɔɔ ɔman no nyinaa asu no, ɔbɔɔ Yesu nso asu, na ɔrebɔ mpaeɛ no, ɔsoro bueeɛ
na Honhom Kronkron sianee honam tebea mu te sɛ aburuburo baa ne so, na ɛnne bi firi soro kaa sɛ: Wone me dɔba, wo na wosɔ m’ani.
Yesu firii n’adwuma aseɛ no, na wadi bɛyɛ mfirinhyia aduasa, (na nkurɔfoɔ dwenee no sɛ ɔyɛ Yosef ba), Eli ba,
Mattat ba, Lewi ba, Melki ba, Yanai ba, Yosef ba,
Matatia ba, Amos ba, Nahum ba, Hesli ba, Nagai ba,
Mahat ba, Matatia ba, Semein ba, Yosek ba, Yoda ba,
Yohanan ba, Resa ba, Serubabel ba, Sealtiel ba, Neri ba,
Melki ba, Adi ba, Kosam ba, Elmadam ba, Er ba,
Yosua ba, Eliesa ba, Yorim ba, Matat ba, Lewi ba,
Simeon ba, Yuda ba, Yosef ba, Yonam ba, Eliakim ba,
Melea ba, Mena ba, Matata ba, Natan ba, Dawid ba,
Yisai ba, Obed ba, Boas ba, Sala ba, Nahson ba,
Aminadab ba, Admin ba, Arni ba, Hesron ba, Peres ba, Yuda ba,
Yakob ba, Isak ba, Abraham ba, Tera ba, Nahor ba,
Serug ba, Reu ba, Peleg ba, Eber ba, Sela ba,
Kainan ba, Arfaksad ba, Sem ba, Noa ba, Lamek ba,
Metusela ba, Henok ba, Yared ba, Mahalaleel ba, Kainan ba,
Enos ba, Set ba, Adam ba, Nyankopɔn ba.
Na Yesu a Honhom Kronkron ahyɛ no ma no sane firii Yordan ho, na Honhom no de no kɔɔ ɛserɛ so.
Na ɔbonsam sɔɔ no hwɛe adaduanan. Nso nna no mu no, wanni hwee; na ɔwieeɛ no, ɛkɔm dee no.
Na ɔbonsam ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ woyɛ Nyankopɔn ba a, hyɛ ɔboɔ yi na ɛnnane paanoo.
Na Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ: Ɛnyɛ paanoo nko so na onipa nam bɛtena aseɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔde no kɔɔ beaeɛ a ɛkorɔn, kɔkyerɛɛ no wiase ahennie nyinaa prɛko.
Na ɔbonsam ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo na mede tumi yi nyinaa ne emu animuonyam bɛma woɔ; na wɔde ahyɛ me nsa, na obiara a mepɛ no, mede mema no;
enti sɛ wokoto sɔre me a, ne nyinaa bɛyɛ wo dea.
Na Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Sɔre Awurade wo Nyankopɔn,
na ɔno nko na som no!

verse.content: Na ɔde no kɔɔ Yerusalem, na ɔde no kɔgyinaa asɔrefie atifi, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ woyɛ Nyankopɔn ba a, to wo ho firi ha twene fam!
Na wɔatwerɛ sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wo nti, ɔbɛhyɛ n’abɔfoɔ
sɛ wɔmmɛhwɛ wo,

verse.content: na

block_quote.content: wɔmmɛsoa wo wɔn nsam,
na woamfa wo nan ampem ɔboɔ.

verse.content: Na Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔaka sɛ: Nsɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn nhwɛ!

verse.content: Na ɔbonsam wiee sɔhwɛ no nyinaa no, ɔgyaa no hɔ kɔe kakra.
Na Yesu nam Honhom no ahoɔden mu sane baa Galilea, na ne ho asɛm trɛɛ asase a atwa ahyia no nyinaa so.
Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn hyia adan mu, na wɔn nyinaa hyɛɛ no animuonyam.
Na ɔbaa Nasaret a wɔtetee no wɔ hɔ no, na homeda, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ daa no, ɔkɔɔ hyiadan mu, na ɔsɔre gyinae sɛ ɔrebɛkenkan.
Na wɔde Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nwoma hyɛɛ ne nsa; na ɔtrɛɛ nwoma no mu hunuu faako a wɔatwerɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Awurade honhom wɔ me so,
na enti wasra me sɛ
memmɛka asɛmpa menkyerɛ ahiafoɔ;
wasoma me sɛ memmɛka ɔgyeɛ menkyerɛ nnommum
ne adehunu menkyerɛ anifirafoɔ,
na memmrɛ wɔn a wɔapɛkyɛ wɔn no ahofadie,
na memmɛda afe a Awurade anisɔ bɛba ne nkurɔfoɔ so no adi.

verse.content: Na ɔbobɔɔ nwoma no de maa ɔsomfoɔ no na ɔtenaa ase; na wɔn a wɔwɔ hyiadan mu hɔ nyinaa de wɔn ani hwɛɛ no dinn.
Na ɔfirii aseɛ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnnɛ na twerɛsɛm yi aba mu mo aso mu.

verse.content: Na wɔn nyinaa dii no adanseɛ, na adom nsɛm a ɛfiri n’anomu no yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa, na wɔbisaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ Yosef ba no ni anaa?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ampa ara, mode bɛ yi bɛbu me sɛ: Ɔsafo, sa wo ho yadeɛ! Nnoɔma a yɛate sɛ woyɛɛ no Kapernaum no, yɛ no w’agya kurom ha yi bi!

verse.content: Ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔmpɛ odiyifoɔ biara agye no n’agya kurom.
Na meka no nokorɛ mu, Elia berɛ so a ɔsoro mu too mfeɛ mmiɛnsa ne abosome nsia, na ɛkɔm kɛseɛ baa asase no nyinaa soɔ no, akunafoɔ pii wɔ Israel deɛ,
nanso wɔansoma Elia ankɔ wɔn mu biara nkyɛn sɛ Sidon kuro Sarepta mu ɔbaa kunafoɔ bi nkyɛn.
Na Odiyifoɔ Elisa berɛ so no, na akwatafoɔ pii wɔ Israel deɛ, nanso wɔamma wɔn mu biara ho amfi gye Siriani Naaman.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔwɔ hyiadan mu hɔ nyinaa tee saa no, abufuo hyɛɛ wɔn ma.
Na wɔsɔre sunsumm no firii kuro no mu hɔ, de no kɔɔ bepɔ a wɔn kuro no da soɔ no ano sɛ wɔrekɔsum no ama ne nkɔnkɔ akɔwɔ hɔ.
Nanso ɔfaa wɔn mfimfini kɔe.
Na ɔbaa Galilea kuro bi a ɛde Kapernaum mu; na daa homeda ɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn.
Na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri. Ɛfiri sɛ na n’asɛm no kura tumi.
Na onipa bi wɔ hyiadan mu hɔ a ɔwɔ honhommɔne a ɛyɛ honhom fi, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu
sɛ: Mmɛha yɛn! Ɛdeɛn na yɛne wo Nasareni Yesu wɔ yɛ? Wobaa sɛ worebɛsɛe yɛn anaa? Menim nipa ko a woyɛ, wone Onyankopɔn ne kronkronni no.
Na Yesu teateaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Mua w’ano, na firi ne mu kɔ!

verse.content: Na honhommɔne no bɔɔ no hwee mfimfini hɔ firii ne mu kɔe, na wanyɛ no hwee.
Na wɔn nyinaa ho dwirii wɔn, na wɔkeka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ: Asɛm bɛn ni, sɛ ɔde ahoɔden ne tumi hyɛ ahonhom fi ma wɔfiri adi yi?
Na ne ho asɛm trɛ kɔɔ asase a atwa ahyia no nkuro nyinaa mu.
Na ɔsɔre firii hyiadan mu hɔ baa Simon fie. Na Simon ase baa afoɛ kɛse, na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmɛhwɛ no.
Na ɔbɛgyinaa n’atifi teateaa ɔfoɛ no, na ɛgyaa no. Na amonom hɔ ara ɔsɔre bɛsomm wɔn.
Na owia retɔ no, wɔn a wɔwɔ ayarefoɔ a nyarewa ahodoɔ ha wɔn nyinaa de wɔn brɛɛ no; na ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn nyinaa so mmaako mmaako saa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na ahonhommɔne nso firii nnipa pii mu kɔe, na wɔteaa mu sɛ: Wone Nyankopɔn ba no! Na ɔteateaa wɔn, wamma wɔankasa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnim sɛ ɔne Kristo no.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ ɛserɛ so baabi. Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no hwehwɛɛ no, na wɔbɛduruu ne nkyɛn, na wɔsiankaa no sɛ ɔmmfiri wɔn nkyɛn nnkɔ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛsɛ sɛ meka Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛmpa no mekyerɛ nkuro foforɔ nso; ɛfiri sɛ yei na wɔbɔɔ din somaa me.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa asɛm Yudea hyia adan mu.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ foforɔ no bi ka sɛ:

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ nkurɔfokuo no kyeree ne so sɛ wɔrebɛtie Nyankopɔn asɛm no, na ɔgyina Genesaret tadeɛ no ho;
na ɔhunuu akodoɔ mmienu sɛ ɛsisi ɔtadeɛ no ho, na apofofoɔ no afiri mu rekɔhohoro wɔn asau.
Na ɔkɔɔ ɔkodoɔ no baako a ɛyɛ Simon dea mu srɛɛ no sɛ ɔntwe mfiri fam kakra. Na ɔtenaa aseɛ no, ɔfiri kodoɔ no mu kyerɛkyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no.
Na ɔgyaee kasa no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Simon sɛ:

wj.content: Siane kɔ deɛ ɛdɔ, na monkɔgu mo asau nyi nam!

verse.content: Na Simon buaa sɛ: Owura, yɛayɛ adwuma anadwo yi nyinaa, na yɛannya hwee, nanso w’asɛm nti mɛgu asau no.
Na wɔyɛɛ saa no, wɔbumaa mpataa pii; a na wɔn asau no retete.
Na wɔnyamm wɔn mfɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ kodoɔ baako no mu no sɛ wɔmmra mmɛsɔ wɔn mu; na wɔbae, na wɔhyɛɛ akodoɔ mmienu no mama ma anka ɛreyɛ amem.
Na Simon Petro hunuiɛ no, ɔhwee Yesu nan ase kaa sɛ: Firi me nkyɛn kɔ, Awurade, na meyɛ onipa debɔneyɛni.
Na ɔne wɔn a wɔka ne ho nyinaa, mpataa dodoɔ a wɔyiiɛ no nti, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn;
na sɛ nso ɛyɛɛ Yakobo ne Yohane, Sebedeo mma a wɔyɛ Simon mfɛfoɔ ara ne no. Na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Simon sɛ:

wj.content: Nsuro! Ɛfiri nnɛ wobɛyi nnipa.

verse.content: Na wɔde akodoɔ no baa asase soɔ no, wɔgyaa ne nyinaa hɔ dii n’akyi.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔwɔ nkuro no baako mu no, ɔbarima bi a kwata ayɛ ne ho nyinaa baa hɔ. Na ɔhunuu Yesu no, ɔde n’anim butuu fam srɛɛ no sɛ: Owura, sɛ wopɛ a, wobɛtumi ama me ho afi.
Na ɔtenee ne nsa kaa no kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mepɛ, wo ho mfi!

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara na kwata no firii ne ho kɔeɛ.
Na ɔbaraa no sɛ ɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara; na ɔse:

wj.content: Kɔ, fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfoɔ, na w’ahofire nti kɔma sɛdeɛ Mose hyɛeɛ no, na ɛnyɛ wɔn adanseɛ.

verse.content: Nanso ne ho asɛm trɛɛ mmom, na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii bɛhyiaa sɛ wɔbɛtie no, na wasa wɔn nyarewa.
Nanso ɔtwee ne ho kɔɔ ɛserɛ so kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ da bi a ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no, na Farisifoɔ ne mmara akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ a wɔfiri Galilea ne Yudea nkuraa nyinaa ase ne Yerusalem aba tete hɔ; na Awurade ahoɔden wɔ ne so a ɔde sa yadeɛ.
Na hwɛ, mmarima bi de onipa bi a ɔda kɛtɛ so a, ɔyare mmubuo bae, na wɔrehwehwɛ kwan de no abɛto n’anim.
Na nkurɔfokuo no nti wɔannya kwan a wɔde no bɛfa soɔ aba no, wɔkɔɔ ɔdan no atifi de no faa ntaayaa no mu, ne kɛtɛ so, bɛtoo mfimfini, Yesu anim.
Na ɔhunuu wɔn gyidie no, ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa, wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.

verse.content: Na Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no firii aseɛ susuu sɛ: Hwan ne oyi a ɔka abususɛm yi? Hwan na ɔbɛtumi de bɔne akyɛ, gye Onyankopɔn nko ara?
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn adwene no, ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na moresusu wɔ mo akoma mu yi?
Deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ mmerɛ, sɛ wɔbɛka sɛ: Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo anaasɛ wɔbɛka sɛ: Sɔre na nante?
Na deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na moahunu sɛ Onipa Ba no wɔ tumi wɔ asase so, sɛ ɔde bɔne kyɛ nti,

verse.content: ɔsee obubuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Mese wo sɛ: Sɔre fa wo kɛtɛ, na kɔ wo fie!

verse.content: Na amonom hɔ ara ɔsɔree wɔn anim faa deɛ ɔdaa soɔ no firii hɔ kɔɔ ne fie hyɛɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam.
Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ahodwiri, na wɔhyɛɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam, na ehu kaa wɔn pii, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnnɛ deɛ, yɛahunu anwanwadeɛ.
Na yei akyiri no, ɔfirii adi, na ɔkɔhunuu togyeni bi a ne din de Lewi sɛ ɔte atogyeeɛ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi!

verse.content: Na ɔgyaa biribiara hɔ sɔre bɛdii n’akyi.
Na Lewi too no pono kɛseɛ bi wɔ ne fie; na atogyefoɔ ne nnipa foforɔ pii ne wɔn bɛtenaa hɔ.
Na Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ nwiinwii kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na mo ne togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ didi na monom yi?
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔn a wɔwɔ ahoɔden no, ɛnhia wɔn ɔyaresafoɔ, na mmom wɔn a wɔyareɛ no.

verse.content: Mammɛfrɛ ateneneefoɔ, na mebɛfrɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnsakyera wɔn adwene.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na Yohane asuafoɔ taa di mmuada na wɔbɔ mpaeɛ, na Farisifoɔ asuafoɔ nso yɛ saa ara; na w’asuafoɔ deɛ, wɔdidi na wɔnom!
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mobɛtumi ama ayeforɔ asefoɔ no adi mmuada, berɛ a ayeforɔkunu ne wɔn wɔ hɔ yi?
Na nna bi bɛba a wɔbɛfa ayeforɔkunu no afiri wɔn nkyɛn; saa nna no mu na wɔbɛdi mmuada.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu bɛ yi nso kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Obi mfa ntoma foforɔ sini ntɛ atadeɛ dada mu; ɔyɛ saa a, foforɔ no bɛtu, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔtwa firii foforɔ no mu no ne dada no nsɛ.
Na obi mfa nsa foforɔ ngu nwoma nkotokuo dada mu; anyɛ saa a, nsa foforɔ no bɛma nkotokuo no apaepae, na ahwiehwie agu, na nkotokuo no asɛesɛe.
Na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde nsa foforɔ gu nkotokuo foforɔ mu.
Nso obi nnom nsa dada na ɔnhwehwɛ foforɔ, na mmom ɔka sɛ: Dada no na ɛyɛ.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ homeda bi ɔkɔfaa aburoofuo bi mu, na n’asuafoɔ no pempanee mmɛtem no bi, na wɔposae wɔ wɔn nsa mu wee.
Na Farisifoɔ mu binom bisaa wɔn sɛ: Adɛn na moreyɛ deɛ ɛnni ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ no homeda?
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkenkanee deɛ ɛkɔm dee Dawid ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no, ɔyɛeɛ no?
Sɛdeɛ ɔkɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie, kɔfaa kyerɛ paanoo no diiɛ, na ɔde bi maa wɔn nso a wɔka ne ho a obi nni ho kwan sɛ ɔdi bie, gye asɔfoɔ nko?

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa ba no yɛ homeda so wura.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ homeda foforɔ bi nso ɔkɔɔ hyiadan mu kɔkyerɛkyerɛe. Na onipa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa nifa awuo.
Nso na Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no retɛ no sɛ ɔbɛsa yadeɛ homeda anaa, na wɔanya ho akɔtoto n’ano.
Nanso ɔhunuu wɔn adwene, enti ɔsee onipa a ne nsa awuo no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɔre gyina mfimfini!

verse.content: Na ɔsɔre gyinae.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Merebisa mo: Ɛdeɛn na ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ no homeda, papa anaa bɔne, sɛ wɔbɛgye obi nkwa anaasɛ wɔbɛkum no?

verse.content: Na ɔhwɛɛ wɔn nyinaa hyiae ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Tene wo nsa!

verse.content: Na ɔyɛɛ saa, na ne nsa no sane yɛɛ yie.
Na wɔn deɛ, abufuo yɛɛ wɔn ma, na wɔtuu adekodeɛ a wɔde bɛyɛ Yesu ho agyina.
Na ɛbaa sɛ nna no mu ɔfirii adi kɔɔ bepɔ so mpaebɔ, na ɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn mpaeɛ anadwo mu no nyinaa.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔfrɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no bae, na ɔyii wɔn mu dummienu a ɔfrɛɛ wɔn asomafoɔ;
Simon a ɔfrɛɛ no Petro ne ne nua Andrea, Yakobo ne Yohane, Filipo ne Bartolomeo,
Mateo ne Toma, Alfeo ba Yakobo ne Simon a wɔfrɛ no Selote,
Yakobo ba Yuda ne Yuda Iskariot a ɔdanee yii no maeɛ no.
Na ɔne wɔn sianeeɛ no, ɔbɛgyinaa baabi a ɛhɔ da soɔ; ɔne n’asuafoɔ bebree ne nnipa pii a wɔfiri Yudea nyinaa ne Yerusalem ne Tiro ne Sidon mpoano a wɔbaa sɛ wɔrebɛtie no na wasa wɔn yadeɛ,
ne wɔn a ahonhom fi ha wɔn; na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛka no, ɛfiri sɛ ahoɔden firi ne mu ba; na ɔsaa wɔn nyinaa yadeɛ.
Na ɔmaa n’ani so kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nhyira ne mo ahiafoɔ,
na Nyankopɔn ahennie no yɛ mo dea.
Nhyira ne mo a ɛkɔm de mo yi,
na wɔbɛma mo amee.
Nhyira ne mo a moresu yi,
na mobɛsere.
Nhyira ne mo sɛ nnipa kyiri mo, na wɔyi mo firi wɔn mu na, wɔya mo, na wɔto mo din twene sɛ dimmɔne, Onipa Ba no nti.
Momma mo ani nnye da no, na monni ahurisie! Na hwɛ, mo akatua so ɔsoro; na saa ara na wɔn agyanom de yɛɛ adiyifoɔ no.
Nanso mo a moyɛ adefoɔ deɛ, monnue!
Na moanya mo awerɛkyekyerɛ dada.
Mo a moameɛ, monnue!
na ɛkɔm bɛde mo.
Mo a mosere seesei, monnue!
na mo werɛ bɛho, na moasu.
Nnipa nyinaa ka mo ho asɛm pa a, monnue! Na saa ara nso na wɔn agyanom de yɛɛ adiyifoɔ atorofoɔ no.
Na mese mo a mote yi sɛ: Monnɔ mo atamfoɔ, monyɛ wɔn a wɔtane mo yie,
monhyira wɔn a wɔdome mo, mommɔ mpaeɛ mma wɔn a wɔha mo!
Deɛ ɔbɔ w’aso baako mu no, dane baako no nso ma no. Na deɛ ɔfa w’atadeɛ nkatasoɔ no, mfa w’atadeɛ nhyɛaseɛ nso nkame no!
Obiara a ɔsrɛ woɔ no, ma no! Na deɛ ɔgye w’adeɛ no, mmisa no bio!
Na sɛdeɛ mopɛ sɛ nnipa nyɛ mo no, monyɛ wɔn saa ara!
Na sɛ modɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ mo a, aseda bɛn na mowɔ? Na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nso dɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ wɔn.
Na sɛ moyɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ mo yie no yie a, aseda bɛn na mowɔ? Na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nso yɛ saa ara.
Na sɛ mofɛm wɔn a mo ani da so sɛ mobɛgye wɔn hɔ bio a, aseda bɛn na mowɔ? Na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nso fɛm nnebɔneyɛfoɔ, sɛ wɔbɛgye saa ara bio.
Na monnɔ mo atamfoɔ, na monyɛ yie na momfɛm wɔ deɛ ani nni biribi soɔ, na mo akatua ayɛ bebree, na moayɛ deɛ ɔwɔ sorosoro no mma, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno deɛ, ɔyɛ ma bonniayɛfoɔ ne nnipa bɔne.
Enti monyɛ ntimmɔborɔ sɛdeɛ mo agya nso yɛ ntimmɔborɔ no.
Nanso mommmu atɛn, na wɔammu mo atɛn; mommmu fɔ, na wɔammu mo fɔ; momfa nkyɛ, na wɔde akyɛ mo.
Momma, na wɔama mo; susukoraa pa a wɔamia soɔ, na wɔawosoɔ, na abu soɔ na wɔde bɛgu mo ntoma mu. Na susukoraa a mode susuo no, ɛno ara na wɔde bɛsusu ama mo bio.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu wɔn bɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Onifirani bɛtumi akyerɛ onifirani kwan? Wɔn baanu nyinaa renhwe amena mu anaa?
Osuani nsene ne kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ; deɛ wasua biribi ahunu na ɔbɛyɛ sɛ ne kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ.
Na adɛn na wohwɛ duaa a ɛwɔ wo nua ani soɔ, na mpuna a ɛda wo ara w’ani soɔ deɛ, wonhunu?

Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wobɛtumi aka akyerɛ wo nua sɛ: Onua, ma menyi duaa a ɛda w’ani soɔ no! Na wo ara w’ani so mpuna deɛ, wonhunu? Nyaatwomni, yi mpuna no firi w’ani so kane, ansa na woahunu adeɛ yie de ayi wo nua ani so duaa.
Na dua pa biara nni hɔ a ɛso aba bɔne, nanso dua bɔne biara nni hɔ a ɛso aba pa.
Na dua biara n’aba na wɔde hunu. Wɔntete borɔdɔma wɔ nkasɛɛ so, nanso wɔntete obobe aba wɔ nwerɛ so.

Onipa pa firi nnepa a waboaboa ano n’akoma mu no mu na ɔyi adepa adie, na onipa bɔne firi nnebɔne a waboaboa ano n’akoma mu no mu na ɔyi adebɔne adie; na ɛfiri deɛ ayɛ akoma ma aboro soɔ no mu na ano ka.
Na adɛn na mofrɛ me: Awurade, Awurade, na monyɛ deɛ meseɛ?
Obiara a ɔba me nkyɛn na ɔtie me nsɛm, na ɔyɛ no, mɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɔsɛ no:
Ɔte sɛ onipa a ɔtoo aban, na ɔtutu maa no dɔeɛ, na ɔtoo fapem ɔbotan soɔ; na nsuo yiriiɛ no, ɛbɔ faa aban no ho, na antumi anwoso no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔtoo no yie.
Na deɛ ɔteɛ, na ɔnyɛ no, te sɛ onipa a ɔtoo aban asase ani, na ɛnni fapem; ɛno na nsuo yiri faa ho, na ntɛm ara ɛhwee ase, na aban no sɛee koraa.

verse.content: Na ɔwiee ne nsɛm nyinaa ka wɔ nkurɔfoɔ no aso mu no, ɔkɔhyɛnee Kapernaum.
Na asraafoɔ ɔha so panin bi akoa a ɔsom bo ma no yare, na ɔreyɛ awu.
Na ɔtee Yesu nka no, ɔsomaa Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ kɔɔ ne nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmra mmɛsa n’akoa no yadeɛ.
Na wɔduruu Yesu nkyɛn no, wɔsrɛɛ no denden sɛ: Ɔfata sɛ wobɛyɛ saa adeɛ yi ama no;
ɛfiri sɛ ɔdɔ yɛn man, na ɔno na wasi hyiadan ama yɛn.
Na Yesu ne wɔn kɔe. Na ɔreyɛ abɛn efie no ho no, asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no somaa ne nnamfo bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no sɛ: Owura, nha wo ho, na mensɛ sɛ wobɛhyɛne me suhyɛ aseɛ;
enti nso na mammu me ho sɛ mefata sɛ meba wo nkyɛn, na ka asɛm nko, na m’akoa no ho nyɛ no den.
Na me nso meyɛ onipa a mehyɛ tumi aseɛ, na mewɔ asraafoɔ wɔ m’ase, na sɛ mese oyi sɛ: Kɔ! a, ɔkɔ, na mese ɔfoforɔ sɛ: Bra! a, ɔba, na mese m’akoa sɛ: Yɛ yei! a, ɔyɛ.
Na Yesu tee yei no, ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa, na ɔdanee ne ho kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo a wɔdi n’akyire no sɛ:

wj.content: Mese mo sɛ, Israel mu mpo, menhunuu gyidie kɛseɛ a ɛte sɛɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn no sane kɔɔ fie no, wɔkɔhunuu akoa a na ɔyareɛ no sɛ ne ho ayɛ no den.
Na ɛbaa sɛ adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔkɔɔ kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Nain mu, na n’asuafoɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ pii ne no kɔe.
Na ɔbɛn kuro no pono akyiri no, hwɛ, na wɔso obi a wawu a ɔyɛ ne na babarima korɔ a wɔde no refiri adie. Na ɔbaa no yɛ okunafoɔ; na na kurom hɔfoɔ pii ka ne ho.
Na Awurade hunuu ɔbaa no no, ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nsu!

verse.content: Na ɔba bɛkaa funnaka no, na wɔn a wɔso no gyinae. Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Aberanteɛ, mese wo sɛ: Sɔre!

verse.content: Na owufoɔ no sɔre tenaa ase, na ɔfirii aseɛ kasae, na ɔde no maa ne na.
Na ehu kaa wɔn nyinaa, na wɔyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ: Odiyifoɔ kɛseɛ asɔre wɔ yɛn mu, na Onyankopɔn abɛhwɛ ne man.
Na ne ho asɛm yi trɛɛ Yudea nyinaa ne asase a atwa ahyia nyinaa so.
Na Yohane asuafoɔ kɔkaa yeinom nyinaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.
Na Yohane frɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no mu baanu somaa wɔn kɔɔ Awurade nkyɛn sɛ: Wone deɛ ɔreba no anaasɛ yɛntwɛn ɔfoforɔ?
Na nnipa no baa ne nkyɛn no, wɔkaa sɛ: Yohane suboni somaa yɛn wo nkyɛn sɛ: Wone deɛ ɔreba no, anaasɛ yɛntwɛn ɔfoforɔ?
Na ɛdɔn no ara mu ɔsaa nnipa bebree yadeɛ ne haw ne ahonhommɔne, na pii nso a wɔn ani afira, ɔmaa wɔn hunuu adeɛ.
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ nkɔka deɛ moahunu ne deɛ moateɛ nkyerɛ Yohane sɛ: Anifirafoɔ hunu adeɛ, mmubuafoɔ nante, akwatafoɔ ho fi, asotifoɔ te asɛm, awufoɔ nyane, na wɔreka asɛmpa akyerɛ ahiafoɔ;
na nhyira ne deɛ merenyɛ no suntidua.

verse.content: Na Yohane abɔfoɔ no kɔeɛ no, ɔfirii aseɛ kaa Yohane ho asɛm kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na mofirii adi kɔɔ ɛserɛ so kɔhwɛeɛ? Mmɛwa a mframa rehim?
Anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na mofiri kɔhwɛeɛ? Onipa a ɔhyɛ ntadeɛ bɔkɔɔ? Hwɛ, wɔn a wɔhyɛ ntade pa na wɔn asetena mu yɛ wɔn dɛ wɔ ahemfie.
Anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na mofiri kɔhwɛeɛ? Odiyifoɔ anaa? Aane, mese mo sɛ, deɛ ɔsene odiyifoɔ mpo ni.
Oyi ne deɛ wɔatwerɛ ne ho asɛm sɛ:
Hwɛ, meresoma me bɔfoɔ adi w’anim
a ɔbɛsiesie wo kwan adi w’anim.
Mese mo sɛ, wɔn a mmaa awo wɔn no mu biara nyɛ kɛse nsene Yohane; nanso deɛ ɔyɛ akumaa Nyankopɔn ahennie mu no, yɛ kɛseɛ sene no.

verse.content: (Na nkurɔfoɔ a wɔteeɛ nyinaa ne togyefoɔ gyee Onyankopɔn nnwuma too mu maa wɔde Yohane asubɔ no bɔɔ wɔn asu;
na Farisifoɔ ne mmarakyerɛfoɔ no deɛ, wɔpoo Nyankopɔn tirim asɛm a ɛwɔ hɔ ma wɔn, na wɔamma wammɔ wɔn asu.)
Ɔse:

wj.content: Ɛhefoɔ ho na mede nnɛ mma yi bɛtoɔ? Na wɔte sɛ ɛhefoɔ?
Wɔte sɛ mmɔfra a wɔtete dwa mu, refrɛfrɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ:
Yɛahyɛne atɛntɛbɛn ama mo, na moansa;
yɛatwa agyaadwo, na moansu.
Na Yohane suboni aba, ɔnnidi na ɔnnom nsa, na mose: Ɔwɔ honhommɔne.
Onipa ba no aba, ɔdidi na ɔnom, na mose: Hwɛ, onipa didifoɔ ne ɔsanomfoɔ, togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adamfo.
Nanso nyansa mma nyinaa bu no bem.

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no mu baako hyiaa no adidie; na ɔkɔɔ Farisini no fie kɔtenaa adidiiɛ.
Na hwɛ, ɔbaa debɔneyɛni bi a ɔwɔ kuro no mu tee sɛ ɔte adidiiɛ Farisini no fie no, ɔde ngo hwamhwam toa ma bae,
na ɔbɛgyinaa n’akyi ne nan ho, na ɔresu, na ɔfirii aseɛ de nisuo no fɔɔ ne nan ho, na ɔde ne tirinwi pepaa ho, na ɔfee ne nan ho, na ɔde ngo hwamhwam no sraa ho.
Na Farisini a ɔhyiaa no adidie no hunuiɛ no, ɔkaa ne tirim sɛ: Onipa yi, sɛ ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ a, anka ɔbɛhunu onii ne ɔbaa ko a ɔde ne nsa ka no yi sɛ ɔyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛni.
Na Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, mewɔ asɛm bi meka mekyerɛ wo.

verse.content: Na ɔse: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ka!
Ɔse:

wj.content: Boseabɔni bi wɔ akafoɔ baanu; ɔbaako de no denare ahanum, na ɔbaako de no aduonum.
Na wɔnnya biribi ntua no, ɔde kyɛɛ wɔn baanu nyinaa kwa. Enti kyerɛ me wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛdɔ no bebrebe.

verse.content: Na Simon buaa se: Mesusu sɛ deɛ ɔde bebrebe kyɛɛ no no. Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Woabua no yie.

verse.content: Na ɔdanee n’ani kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no see Simon sɛ:

wj.content: Woahunu ɔbaa yi? Mebaa wo fie, woamma me nsuo mangu me nan so, na ɔbaa yi deɛ, ɔde ne nisuo afɔ me nan ho, na ɔde ne tirinwi apepa ho.
Woamfe m’ano, na ɔbaa yi deɛ, ɛfiri sɛ mebaa ha yi, ɔnnyaee me nan ho feɛ.
Woamfa ngo ansra me tirim, na ɔbaa yi deɛ, ɔde ngo hwamhwam asra me nan ho.
Na yei nti mese wo sɛ, wɔde ne bɔne a ɛdɔɔso no akyɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdɔ pii. Na deɛ wɔde kakraa bi kyɛ no no, ɔdɔ kakraa bi.

verse.content: Na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no firii aseɛ kekaa no wɔn mu sɛ: Hwan ne oyi a ɔde bɔne nso kyɛ?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo gyidie agye wo, kɔ asomdwoeɛ mu!

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ yei akyiri no, ɔkɔfaa nkuro ne nkuraa nyinaa mu, kaa Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛmpa kyerɛe, na dummienu no ka ne ho,
ne mmaa bi a wasa wɔn ahonhommɔne ne ahoɔmmerɛ, wɔn ne Maria a wɔfrɛ no Magdalene a ɔtuu ahonhommɔne nson firii ne mu no
ne Yohana, Herode fiepanin Kusa yere, ne Susana ne afoforɔ bebree a wɔde wɔn ahodeɛ bi somm no.
Na nkurɔfokuo pii boaboaa wɔn ano ne wɔn a wɔfiri nkuro no nyinaa mu baa ne nkyɛn no, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Ogufoɔ bi firii adi kɔguu n’aba. Na ɔreguo no, ebi kɔguu kwankyɛn; na wɔtiatiaa so, na ewiem nnomaa bɛsosɔe.
Na ebi kɔguu ɔbotan so; na ɛfifiriiɛ no, ɛhyee, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnni fonwunu ntira.
Na ebi kɔguu nkasɛɛ mu; na nkasɛɛ no ne no fifirii, na ɛmiaa no.
Na ebi kɔguu asase pa mu; na ɛfifirii, na ɛsoo aba ahodoɔ ɔha.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔteaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɔwɔ aso bɛtie no, ma no ntie!

verse.content: Na n’asuafoɔ no bisaa no sɛ: Ɛbɛ yi ase ne sɛn?
Na ɔse:

wj.content: Mo deɛ, wɔde ama mo sɛ monhunu Nyankopɔn ahennie mu ahuntasɛm no; na wɔn a aka deɛ, wɔde ama wɔn mmebuo mu,
na wɔahunu, na wɔanhunu mu,
na wɔate, nanso wɔante aseɛ.

verse.content: Na ɛbɛ no ni:

wj.content: Aba a wɔguo no ne Nyankopɔn asɛm.
Ɔkwankyɛn deɛ no ne wɔn a wɔteɛ; na ɔbonsam ba bɛyi asɛm no firi wɔn akoma mu, na wɔannye anni na wɔannye wɔn nkwa.
Ɔbotan so deɛ no ne wɔn a wɔte asɛm no a, wɔde anigyeɛ gyeɛ, nanso yeinom nni nhini, na wɔgye di ma no kyɛre kakra, na sɔhwɛ berɛ ba a, na wɔagyae.
Na deɛ ɛguu nkasɛɛ mu no ne wɔn a wɔteɛ, na wɔnam asetena yi mu dadwene ne haw ne ahonya ne anigyedeɛ mu na ɛmia wɔn, na wɔn aba no mmere nwie.
Na asase pa mu deɛ no ne wɔn a wɔde akoma pa a ɛyɛ te asɛm no, na wɔde sie, na wɔnam boasetɔ mu so aba.
Na obi nsɔ kanea mfa adeɛ nkata so, anaasɛ ɔmfa nsi mpa ase; na mmom ɔde si kaneadua so, na wɔn a wɔkɔ mu hɔ ahunu kanea no.
Na biribi nni kokoam a wɔrenyi no adie, na ahunta a wɔrenhunu, na ɛrenna adie.
Enti monhwɛ yie sɛdeɛ mote asɛm no fa. Na obiara a ɔwɔ no na wɔde bɛma no; na deɛ ɔnni bi deɛ, deɛ ɔsusu sɛ ɔwɔ mpo, wɔbɛgye ne nsam.

verse.content: Na ne na ne ne nuanom baa ne nkyɛn, na nkyeresoɔ no nti wɔantumi ammɛn no.
Na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo na ne wo nuanom gyina mfikyire pɛ sɛ wɔhu woɔ.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me na ne me nuanom ne wɔn a wɔte Nyankopɔn asɛm na wɔdi soɔ.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ da bi ɔne n’asuafoɔ no kɔtenaa kodoɔ mu, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma yɛntwa nkɔ ɔtadeɛ no agya nohoa.

verse.content: Na wɔhare kɔe.
Na wɔrekorɔ no, ɔdae. Na mframa kɛseɛ bi bɔɔ huu baa ɔtadeɛ no so, na nsuo bu faa wɔn so, na wɔwɔ amanehunu mu.
Na wɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛnyanee no sɛ: Owura, owura, yɛreyera! Na ɔsɔre teateaa mframa ne nsuo no aworɔ no; na ɛgyae yɛɛ dinn.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo gyidie wɔ he?

verse.content: Na wɔsuroe, na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa, na wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Onipa bɛn ara ni na ɔhyɛ mframa ne nsuo mpo na ɛtie no yi?
Na wɔkɔduruu Gerasefoɔ asase a ɛwɔ Galilea ntentensoɔ so.
Na ɔsii fam no, ɔbarima bi a ahonhommɔne wɔ ne mu dadaada, a ɔfiri kuro no mu bɛhyiaa no, ɔnhyɛ atadeɛ, na ɔnte ɛdan biara mu, na mmom aboda mu na ɔte wɔ asieeɛ.
Na ɔhunuu Yesu no, ɔteaa mu denden hwee ase n’anim, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ kaa sɛ: Yesu, Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ sorosoro no ba, ɛdeɛn na me ne wo wɔ yɛ? Mesrɛ wo sɛ nha me!

Ɛfiri sɛ waka akyerɛ honhom fi no sɛ ɔmfiri onipa no mu; (na daa na ɛkye no a, wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ne mpokyerɛ gu no wɛn no, na ɔtete deɛ wɔde akyekyere no no mu. Na honhommɔne no pamm no kɔɔ anwea pradada so.)
Na Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo din de sɛn?

verse.content: Na ɔse: Ɛdɔm, ɛfiri sɛ ahonhommɔne pii akɔ ne mu.
Na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔnnhyɛ wɔn mmma wɔnnkɔ bunu no mu.
Na mprakokuo kɛseɛ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔredidi wɔ bepɔ no soɔ; na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmma wɔn kwan na wɔnkɔ wɔn mu. Na ɔmaa wɔn kwan.
Na ahonhommɔne no firii onipa no mu kɔɔ mprako no mu, na ekuo no bɔɔ kirididi sianee ɔbotan kuronkuron no kɔguu ɔtadeɛ no mu, na wɔmemee.
Na wɔn a wɔhwɛ wɔn soɔ no hunuu deɛ asie no, wɔdwanee, na wɔkɔkaa no kuro no ne nkuraaseɛ mu.
Na wɔfirii adi bɛhwɛɛ deɛ asie; na wɔbaa Yesu nkyɛn, na wɔbɛhunuu onipa a ahonhommɔne firii ne mu kɔeɛ no sɛ ɔte Yesu nan ase fira ntoma a n’adwene mu ateɛ; na wɔsuroe.
Na wɔn nso a wɔhunuiɛ no kaa sɛdeɛ ɛyɛeɛ na deɛ ɔwɔ ahonhommɔne no ho sanee no.
Na Gerasefoɔ asase a atwa ahyia no so nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa srɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfiri wɔn nkyɛn nkɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na ehu kɛseɛ aka wɔn. Na ɔsii kodoɔ mu sane kɔe.
Na ɔbarima no a ahonhommɔne firii ne mu no srɛɛ no sɛ ɔbɛtena ne nkyɛn. Nanso Yesu gyaa no kwan sɛ:

wj.content: Sane kɔ wo fie, na kɔka ade kɛseɛ a Onyankopɔn ayɛ ama woɔ yi kyerɛ!

verse.content: Na ɔkɔ kɔkaa ade kɛseɛ a Yesu ayɛ ama no no kuro no mu nyinaa.
Na Yesu sane baeɛ no, nkurɔfokuo no gyee no; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn nyinaa retwɛn no.
Na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yairo a ɔyɛ hyiadan mu panin bae, na ɔbɛhwee Yesu nan ase srɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmra ne fie;
na ɔwɔ ɔbabaa korɔ a wadi bɛyɛ mfirinhyia dummienu, na ɔda hɔ rewu. Na ɔrekorɔ no, na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no kyere ne so.
Na ɔbaa bi a wanya mogyaguo mfirinhyia dummienu, na obiara antumi ansa no yadeɛ
bɛfirii n’akyi bɛkaa n’atadeɛ ano nnwo, na amonom hɔ ara ne mogyaguo no twae.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Hwan na ɔkaa me?

verse.content: Na wɔn nyinaa resan no, Petro kaa sɛ: Owura, nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no akyere wo so, na wɔremia wo.
Na Yesu se:

wj.content: Obi aka me, na mahunu sɛ ahoɔden bi afiri me mu kɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔbaa no hunuu sɛ ada adi no, ɔde ahopopoɔ ba bɛhwee n’anim, na ɔkaa adekodeɛ a enti ɔkɔkaa no ne sɛdeɛ ne ho sanee no amonom hɔ ara no kyerɛɛ no ɔman no nyinaa anim.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbabaa, wo gyidie agye wo nkwa, kɔ asomdwoeɛ mu!

verse.content: Na ɔrekasa no, obi firi hyiadan mu panin no fie bɛkaa sɛ: Wo babaa no awu, nha kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no!
Na Yesu teeɛ no, ɔbuaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Nsuro, gye di ara, na ɔbɛnya nkwa.

verse.content: Na ɔbaa fie hɔ no, wamma obiara ankɔ mu, gye Petro, Yohane, Yakobo ne abɔfra no agya ne ne na.
Na wɔn nyinaa resu, na wɔregyam no. Na ɔse:

wj.content: Monnsu! Na ɔnwui, na wada.

verse.content: Na wɔseree no, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔnim sɛ wawu.
Na ɔsɔɔ ne nsa frɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Abɔfra, nyane!

verse.content: Na ne honhom sane baa bio, na ɔsɔree ntɛmntɛm; na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔmma no biribi nni.
Na ɛyɛɛ n’awofoɔ ahodwiri; na ɔbaraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnka deɛ asie yi nnkyerɛ obiara.
Na ɔfrɛɛ dummienu no hyiae, maa wɔn ahonhommɔne nyinaa ne ayaresa so tumi ne ahoɔden.
Na ɔsomaa wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔka Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛm, na wɔnsa yadeɛ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommfa biribiara nntu kwan, mommfa poma anaa bɔtɔ anaa aduane anaa sika anaa ntadeɛ mmienu mmienu.
Na efie biara a mobɛkɔ mu no, ɛhɔ ara na montena, na moafiri hɔ akɔ.
Na wɔn a wɔrennye mo no, mofiri kurom hɔ rekɔ a, momporoporo mo nan ase mfuturo mfa nni adanseɛ ntia wɔn.

verse.content: Na wɔsii mu hɔ faa nkuraa nyinaa ase mmaako mmaako kaa asɛmpa no, na wɔsaa yadeɛ baabiara.
Na ɔmansinihene Herode tee deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa; na ne tiri mu yɛɛ no keserenee sɛ ebinom se: Wɔanyane Yohane afiri awufoɔ mu,
na ebinom se: Elia ayi ne ho akyerɛ, na afoforɔ se: Tete adiyifoɔ no mu baako asɔre.
Na Herode kaa sɛ: Yohane deɛ, matwa ne ti, na hwan ne oyi a mete ne ho nsɛm a ɛte sɛɛ yi? Na ɔhwehwɛɛ sɛ ɔhu no.
Na asomafoɔ no sane bae, na wɔbɛkaa deɛ wɔakɔyɛ nyinaa kyerɛɛ no. Na ɔfaa wɔn de wɔn kɔɔ afa baabi, kuro a wɔfrɛ no Betsaida no ho.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no hunuiɛ no, wɔdii n’akyi; na ɔgyee wɔn kaa wɔn Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛm, na ɔsaa wɔn a ɛhia ayaresa no yadeɛ.
Na adeɛ reyɛ asa; na dummienu no ba bɛsee no sɛ: Gya nkurɔfokuo no kwan na wɔnkɔ nkuro ne nkuraase a atwa ahyia yi so nkɔtena hɔ, na wɔanya aduane; na baabi a yɛwɔ yi yɛ ɛserɛ so.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma wɔn biribi nni!

verse.content: Na wɔse: Yɛnni biribiara sɛ paanoo nnum ne mpataa mmienu pɛ, gye sɛ yɛkɔtɔ aduane ma nkurɔfoɔ yi nyinaa.
Na wɔbɛyɛ mmarima mpemnum. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Momma wɔntenatena ase akuakuo bɛyɛ aduonum aduonum.

verse.content: Na wɔyɛɛ saa, na wɔmaa wɔn nyinaa tenatenaa ase.
Na ɔfaa paanoo nnum ne mpataa mmienu no hwɛɛ ɔsoro hyiraa so, na ɔbubu de maa asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkyɛ mma nkurɔfokuo no.
Na wɔdii, na wɔn nyinaa meemee, na wɔtasee mporoporowa a ɛkaeɛ no nkɛntɛn dummienu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔno nko wɔ hɔ rebɔ mpaeɛ no, na n’asuafoɔ no ka ne ho; na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no se: Mene hwan?

verse.content: Na wɔbuaa sɛ: Yohane suboni, na ebinom se: Elia, na afoforɔ se: Tete adiyifoɔ no mu bi na wasɔreɛ.
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo deɛ, mose mene hwan?

verse.content: Na Petro buaa sɛ: Onyankopɔn Kristo no.
Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ketee, baraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnka yei nnkyerɛ obiara
sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛsɛ sɛ Onipa Ba no hunu amane pii, na mpanimfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ apo no, na wɔakum no, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wanyane.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn nyinaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyiri a, ɔmpa ne ho akyi, na ɔmfa n’asɛnnua daa, na ɔnni m’akyi.
Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛgye ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa, na deɛ me nti ne kra bɛfiri ne nsa no, ɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Na sɛ onipa nya wiase nyinaa, na ɔyera anaasɛ ɔhwere ne ho a, mfasoɔ bɛn na ɔbɛnya?
Na obiara a n’ani bɛwu me ne me nsɛm ho no, ɔno nso ho bɛyɛ Onipa Ba no aniwu ɛda a ɔde ɔno ne n’agya ne n’abɔfoɔ kronkron animuonyam bɛba no.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Wɔn a wɔgyina ha yi mu binom wɔ hɔ a, wɔrenka owuo nhwɛ kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhunu Nyankopɔn ahennie ansa.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ nsɛm yi akyi bɛyɛ nnawɔtwe no, ɔfaa Petro ne Yohane ne Yakobo, na ɔne wɔn kɔɔ bepɔ so mpaebɔ.
Na ɔrebɔ mpaeɛ no, n’anim tebea sakyerae, na n’atadeɛ yɛɛ fitaa, na ɛhrann.
Na hwɛ, mmarima baanu a ɛyɛ Mose ne Elia ne no bɛkasae;
na wɔyii wɔn ho adi animuonyam mu, na wɔkaa ne wuo a ɔbɛwu wɔ Yerusalem ho asɛm.
Na nna afa Petro ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no; na wɔnyaneeɛ no, wɔhunuu n’animuonyam no ne mmarima baanu no sɛ wɔne no gyina hɔ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔrefiri ne nkyɛn akorɔ no, Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ: Owura, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛtena ha, na ma yɛmmɔ asese mmiɛnsa, wo deɛ baako, Mose deɛ baako, na Elia deɛ baako; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔnnim deɛ ɔreka.
Na ɔreka saa no, mununkum ba bɛkataa wɔn so; na wɔrekɔ mununkum no mu no, wɔsuroe.
Na ɛnne bi firii mununkum no mu kaa sɛ: Oyi ne me ba a mayi no, montie no!
Na ɛnne no twaa mu no, wɔhunuu Yesu nko ara. Na wɔmuamuaa so, na nna no mu no, wɔanka nnoɔma a wɔhunuiɛ no ankyerɛ obiara.
Na ɛbaa sɛ adeɛ kyeeɛ a wɔfiri bepɔ no so sii fam no, nkurɔfokuo bebree bɛhyiaa no.
Na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi a ɔfiri nkurɔfoɔ no mu teaa mu sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, mesrɛ wo, hwɛ me ba yi, na ɔyɛ me ba korɔ.
Na hwɛ, honhom bi kye no, na ɔfu mu tea mu su, na ɛsensene no ma n’ano twa ahuro, na ɔbu fa so, na ɛdene no ansa na agyaa no.
Na mesrɛɛ w’asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔntu no, nanso wɔantumi.
Na Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: O ɛnnɛ mma a wɔnni gyidie na wɔakyeakyea, mentena mo nkyɛn na mento me bo ase mo ho nkɔduru da bɛn? Fa wo ba no bra ha!

verse.content: Na ɔreba no, honhommɔne no himm no hwee fam, na ɛsensenee no. Na Yesu teateaa honhom fi no, na ɔsaa abɔfra no yadeɛ, na ɔde no maa n’agya.
Na Nyankopɔn ahoɔden kɛseɛ yi yɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ahodwiri. — Na nnoɔma a Yesu yɛeɛ no nyinaa yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa no, ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Momma nsɛm yi nkɔ mo aso mu; na wɔrebɛyi onipa ba no ahyɛ nnipa nsa.

verse.content: Na wɔante asɛm yi ase, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔde ahunta wɔn na wɔanhunu. Na wɔsuroo sɛ wɔbɛbisa no asɛm yi.
Na asɛm bi baa wɔn mu sɛ wɔn mu hwan na ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ?
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn akoma mu nsusuiɛ no, ɔfaa abɔfra bi bɛgyinaa ne nkyɛn,
na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara a ɔbɛgye abɔfra yi me din mu no, wagye me; na obiara a ɔbɛgye me no, na wagye deɛ ɔsomaa me no. Na deɛ ɔyɛ mo nyinaa mu akumaa no, ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ.

verse.content: Na Yohane buaa sɛ: Owura, yɛhunuu sɛ obi de wo din retu ahonhommɔne; na yɛbaraa no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔne yɛn na ɛnam.
Na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Mommmara no! Na deɛ ɔnyɛ biribi ntia mo no na ɔwɔ mo afa.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ nna a wɔrebɛfa no akɔ ɔsoro reyɛ awie duru no, ɔde sii n’anim sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Yerusalem.
Na ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ dii n’anim; na wɔkɔeɛ no, wɔkɔhyɛnee Samariafoɔ akuraa bi ase sɛ wɔrekɔsiesie hɔ ama no.
Na wɔannye no, ɛfiri sɛ na n’ani kyerɛ Yerusalem.
Na n’asuafoɔ Yakobo ne Yohane hunuiɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Awurade, wopɛ sɛ yɛka na ogya firi soro bɛhye wɔn?
Na ɔdanee ne ho kaa wɔn anim.
Na wɔkɔɔ akuraa foforɔ bi ase.
Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔnam kwan mu rekorɔ no, obi ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Awurade, baabiara a wobɛkorɔ no, mɛdi w’akyi.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Nsakraman wɔ abɔn, na ewiem nnomaa wɔ mpirebuo; na Onipa Ba no deɛ, ɔnni deɛ ɔde ne tiri toɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔfoforɔ sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi!

verse.content: Na ɔno deɛ ɔse: Ma me kwan na menkɔsie m’agya ansa.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ma awufoɔ nsie wɔn awufoɔ, na wo deɛ, kɔ na kɔka Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛm!

verse.content: Na ɔfoforɔ nso kaa sɛ: Awurade, mɛdi w’akyi, na ma me kwan na menkɔkra wɔn a wɔwɔ me fie ansa.
Na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara a ɔde ne nsa kɔsɔ funtumdadeɛ mu na ɔhwɛ n’akyire no mfata Nyankopɔn ahennie no mu.

note.content: Tete Atwerɛfoɔ binom de ka ho sɛ: Monnim honhom ko a moyɛ ne dea? Onipa ba no amma ammɛsɛe nnipa akra, na mmom ɔbɛgyee wɔn.

verse.content: Yeinom akyiri no, Awurade yii nnipa aduɔson
bio, na ɔsomasomaa wɔn baanu baanu dii n’anim kɔɔ kuro biara ne baabiara a ɔno ara rebɛkɔ hɔ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Otwa adwuma no so, na adwumayɛfoɔ no deɛ, wɔsua; enti monsrɛ otwa no wura no, na ɔntu adwumayɛfoɔ mmra ne twa no mu.
Monkɔ! Hwɛ, meresoma mo sɛ nnwanten akɔ mpataku mu.
Mommfa sika kotokuo anaa akwantuo bɔtɔ anaa mpaboa; na monnkyea obi ɔkwan mu!
Na efie biara a mobɛkɔ mu no, monse kane sɛ: Asomdwoeɛ mmra efie ha!
Na sɛ asomdwoeɛ ba wɔ hɔ a, mo asomdwoeɛ bɛtena ne so; na sɛ ɛnte saa a, ɛbɛsane aba mo so.
Na efie hɔ ara na montena, na monni na monnom deɛ ɛwɔ wɔn nsam; na odwumayɛfoɔ akatua sɛ no. Mommfiri efie mu nnkɔ efie mu!
Na kuro biara a mobɛkɔ mu no, wɔgye mo a, monni deɛ wɔde bɛsi mo anim!
Na monsa emu ayarefoɔ yadeɛ, na monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Nyankopɔn ahennie abɛn mo.
Na kuro biara a mobɛkɔ mu na wɔrennye mo no, momfiri adi nkɔ kuro no abɔntene so, na monka sɛ:
Mfuturo a ɛfiri mo kuro mu, a ahura yɛn nan ho mpo, yɛreprapra agu mo so; na ɛyɛ dɛn ara a, monhunu yei sɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie abɛn mo.
Na mese mo sɛ, ɛda no, ɛbɛfanyinam Sodom asene kuro no.
Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Ɛfiri sɛ ahoɔdenneɛ a wɔayɛ no mo mu yi, sɛ wɔyɛɛ no Tiro ne Sidon a, anka wɔtenatenaa ayitoma ne nso mu sakyeraa wɔn adwene ntɛm ara.
Nso atemmuo mu no, ɛbɛfanyinam Tiro ne Sidon asene mo.
Na wo Kapernaum,
wɔbɛma wo so akɔ ɔsoro anaa?
Hwɛ, wɔbɛbrɛ wo ase akɔ Asamando.
Deɛ ɔtie mo no, watie me; na deɛ ɔpa mo no, wapa me. Na deɛ ɔpa me no, wapa deɛ ɔsomaa me no.

verse.content: Na aduɔson no de anigyeɛ sane ba bɛkaa sɛ: Awurade, wo din mu ahonhommɔne mpo abrɛ wɔn ho ase ama yɛn.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mehunuu Satan sɛ ɔfiri soro hwee ase sɛ anyinam.
Hwɛ, mema mo tumi sɛ montiatia awɔ ne anyanyankyerɛ ne ɔtamfoɔ no ahoɔden nyinaa so; na biribiara rentumi nyɛ mo hwee.
Nanso yei mu deɛ, mommma mo ani nnnye sɛ ahonhom abrɛ wɔn ho ase ama mo; na mmom, momma mo ani nnye sɛ wɔatwerɛ mo din ɔsoro.

verse.content: Ɛdɔn no ara mu ne ho sanee no honhom mu, na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, ɔsoro ne asase Wura, meyi wo ayɛ sɛ wode nnoɔma yi ahunta anyansafoɔ ne animdefoɔ, na woayi akyerɛ nkɔkoaa. Aane, Agya, ne saa na ɛyɛ anisɔ wɔ w’anim.
M’Agya de nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa; na obi nnim deɛ Ɔba no yɛ, gye Agya no. Nanso obi nnim deɛ Agya no yɛ, gye Ɔba no ne deɛ Ɔba no pɛ sɛ ɔyi no adi kyerɛ no.

verse.content: Na ɔdanee ne ho kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn nko sɛ:

wj.content: Nhyira ne ani a ɛhunu deɛ mohunu yi;
na mese mo sɛ, adiyifoɔ ne ahemfo bebree pɛɛ sɛ anka wɔhunu nnoɔma a mohunu yi, na wɔanhunu, na wɔte nsɛm a moteɛ yi, na wɔante.

verse.content: Na hwɛ, mmarakyerɛni bi sɔre gyinaa hɔ sɔɔ no hwɛe sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, menyɛ dɛn na manya daa nkwa?
Na Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na wɔatwerɛ mmara no mu? Wokenkan no sɛn?

verse.content: Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Fa w’akoma nyinaa, ne wo kra nyinaa, ne w’ahoɔden nyinaa, ne w’adwene nyinaa dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn; na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Woabua no yie; yɛ yei, na wobɛnya nkwa.

verse.content: Na ɔno deɛ, ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔbu ne ho bem, nti ɔka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ: Na hwan ne me yɔnko?
Na Yesu yii ano sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa bi firi Yerusalem siane kɔɔ Yeriko, na ɔkɔtɔɔ akwanmukafoɔ mu, na wɔpaa ne ho ntoma, bobɔɔ no afɛ, gyaa no hɔ kɔe a na watɔ bera.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔsɔfoɔ bi bɛfaa kwan no so; na ɔbɛhunuu no no, ɔsianee ne ho kɔeɛ.
Saa ara nso na Lewini bi a ɔbaa hɔnom, ɔbɛhunuu no no, ɔsianee ne ho kɔeɛ.
Na Samariani bi a ɔnam ne kwan baa deɛ ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔhunuu no no, ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ.
Na ɔkɔɔ ne nkyɛn kɔkyekyeree n’akuro no, de ngo ne nsa guguu mu, na ɔde no tenaa ɔno ara n’aboa so de no kɔɔ ahɔhodan mu kɔhwɛɛ no.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔyii denare mmienu de maa ahɔhodan mu panin no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ no, na biribiara a wobɛhwere aka ho no, mesane meba a, mɛhyɛ wo ananmu.
Afei wɔn baasa yi mu hwan na wosusu sɛ wayɛ deɛ ɔkɔtɔɔ akwanmukafoɔ mu yi yɔnko?

verse.content: Na ɔse: Deɛ ɔhunuu no mmɔborɔ no a. Ɛnna Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ, na wo nso kɔyɛ saa ara!

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔrekorɔ no, ɔkɔɔ akuraa bi ase. Na ɔbaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Marta faa no kɔɔ ne fie.
Na Marta wɔ onuabaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Maria a ɔtenaa Awurade nan ase tiee n’asɛm.
Na Marta deɛ, ɔbrɛɛ ne ho ɔsom pii ho; na ɔbɛgyinaa hɔ kaa sɛ: Awurade, wonhwɛ sɛ me nua agya me nko hɔ, na meresom? Enti ka kyerɛ no, na ɔmmɛsɔ me mu abia.
Na Awurade bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Marta, Marta, wodwendwene, na woha wo ho nnoɔma pii ho;
adeɛ baako na ɛhia: Maria deɛ, wayi deɛ ɛyɛ no, ɛno na wɔrennye ne nsam.

note.content: Tete Atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu no bi ka sɛ

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔwɔ baabi rebɔ mpaeɛ na ɔgyaeeɛ no, n’asuafoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn mpaebɔ, sɛdeɛ Yohane nso kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mobɔ mpaeɛ a, monka sɛ:
Agya, wo din ho nte,
w’ahennie mmra.
Ma yɛn yɛn daa aduane daa!
Na fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛn,
ɛfiri sɛ yɛn nso de kyɛ obiara a ɔde yɛn aka.
Na mfa yɛn nkɔ sɔhwɛ mu!

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo mu hwan na ɔwɔ adamfoɔ, na ɔbɛkɔ ne nkyɛn ɔdasuo mu akɔka akyerɛ no sɛ: Damfo, fɛm me paanoo mmiɛnsa,
na m’adamfo bi firi kwan so aba me nkyɛn, na mennya biribi memma no.
Na ɔfiri mu nohoa bɛbua no sɛ: Nha me, na wɔato pono mu, na me mma wɔ me nkyɛn wɔ mpa so, na merentumi mensɔre mmɛma wo.
Mese mo sɛ: Adamfoɔ nko mu deɛ a, anka ɔrensɔre mmɛma no; na n’aniɛden nti ɔbɛsɔre abɛma no dodoɔ a ɛhia no.
Nso mese mo sɛ: Mommisa, na wɔbɛma mo; monhwehwɛ, na mobɛhunu; mommom, na wɔbɛhini mo.
Na obiara a ɔbisa no, ɔnya; na deɛ ɔhwehwɛ no, ɔhunu; na deɛ ɔbɔ mu no, wɔbɛhini no.
Na mo mu hwan na ɔyɛ agya, na ne ba bisa no [paanoo a, ɔbɛma no ɔboɔ? Anaasɛ nso ɔbisa no]
apataa a, ɔde ɔwɔ bɛyɛ apataa ama no?
Anaasɛ nso ɔbisa kosua a, ɔbɛma no nyanyankyerɛ?
Na sɛ mo a moyɛ abɔnefoɔ nim sɛdeɛ mode nnepa ma mo mma a, mprɛ ahe ara na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa Honhom Kronkron mma wɔn a wɔbisa no?

verse.content: Na ɔretu honhommɔne bi a ɔyɛ mum. Na ɛbaa sɛ honhommɔne no firii adie no, emum no kasae. Na ɛyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no nwanwa.
Na wɔn mu binom kaa sɛ: Ɔnam ahonhommɔne panin Beelsebul so na ɔtu ahonhommɔne.
Na ebinom sɔɔ no hwɛe hwehwɛɛ ne nkyɛn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi a ɛfiri soro.
Nanso na ɔnim wɔn adwene nti, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ahennie biara a ɛne ne ho di mpaepaemu no dane amamfo, na efie ne fie a ɛdi mpaepaemu no nso bɔ.
Na sɛ Satan nso ne ne ho di mpaepaemu a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na n’ahennie agyina? Sɛ mose: Menam Beelsebul so na metu ahonhommɔne.
Na sɛ menam Beelsebul so na metu ahonhommɔne a, hwan so na mo mma nam tu wɔn? Enti wɔbɛyɛ mo atemmufoɔ.
Na sɛ mede Nyankopɔn nsateaa metu ahonhommɔne a, ɛnneɛ na Nyankopɔn ahennie aba mo so.
Sɛ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ amia rewɛn ne fie a, n’ahodeɛ wɔ hɔ komm.
Na sɛ deɛ ɔsene no ahoɔden ba ne so na ɔdi ne so nkonim a, ɔgye n’akodeɛ a n’ani da soɔ no, na ɔkyɛ n’asadeɛ mu.
Deɛ ɔnka me ho no, na ɔne me anya; na deɛ ɔne me mmoaboa ano no hwete mu.
Sɛ honhom fi firi onipa mu a, ɔkɔkyinkyini akwaweɛ so, hwehwɛ ɔhome; na ɔnnya bi a, ɔse: Mɛsane makɔ me dan a mefiri mu mebaeɛ no mu.
Na ɔba a, ɔbɛhunu sɛ wɔaprapra mu na wɔahyehyɛ mu.
Afei ɔkɔ kɔfa ahonhom foforɔ nson a wɔyɛ bɔne sene ɔno ara ka ne ho, na wɔbɛhyɛne mu a, wɔtena hɔ; na onipa no akyire asetena yɛ bɔne sene kane deɛ no.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔreka yeinom no, ɔbaa bi a ɔwɔ nkurɔfokuo no mu maa ne nne so ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Nhyira ne yafunu a ɛwoo woɔ ne nufoɔ a wonumiiɛ!
Na ɔno deɛ, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ampa ara nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte Nyankopɔn asɛm na wɔdi soɔ!

verse.content: Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no boaboaa wɔn ano pitipiti no, ɔfirii aseɛ kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nnɛ mma yi yɛ abusua bɔne; wɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, nanso wɔremma wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ biara, gye Yona nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no.
Na sɛdeɛ Yona yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ maa Ninewefoɔ no, saa ara nso na Onipa Ba no bɛyɛ ama nnɛ mma yi.
Anafoɔ hemmaa no ne nnɛ mma yi mu mmarima bɛsɔre atemmuo no mu, na wabu wɔn fɔ; ɛfiri sɛ ɔfiri asase ano nohoa bɛtiee Salomo nyansa. Na hwɛ, deɛ ɔsene Salomo wɔ ha.
Ninewe mmarima ne nnɛ mma yi bɛsɔre atemmuo no mu, na wɔabu wɔn fɔ; ɛfiri sɛ Yona asɛnka no nti, wɔsakyeraa wɔn adwene. Na hwɛ, deɛ ɔsene Yona wɔ ha yi.
Obi nsɔ kanea mfa nhyɛ kokoam anaa kodoɔ ase, na ɔde si kaneadua so, na wɔn a wɔba mu no ahunu ne hran.
Wo nipadua kanea ne w’ani. Enti sɛ w’ani yɛ a, wo nipadua nyinaa nso bɛyɛ hann; na sɛ ɛnyɛ a, wo nipadua nso bɛyɛ kusuu.
Enti hwɛ yie, na hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no annane sum.
Enti sɛ wo nipadua nyinaa yɛ hann na baabiara nni sum a, ne nyinaa bɛyɛ hann, sɛdeɛ kanea de ne hyerɛn ma wo hann no.

verse.content: Na ɔrekasa no, Farisini bi srɛɛ no sɛ ɔne no nkɔdidi; na ɔkɔɔ mu kɔtenaa ase.
Na Farisini no hunuu sɛ wanhohoro ne nsa ansa na ɔdidiiɛ no, ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa.
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Afei mo Farisifoɔ deɛ, mohohoro kuruwa ne ayowa ho; na mo mu deɛ, amim ne nnebɔne ahyɛ mu ma.
Nkwaseafoɔ! Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔyɛɛ akyire no na ɔyɛɛ emu nso?
Na hwɛ, deɛ ɛwɔ mu no, momfa bi nyɛ adɔeɛ; ɛno na ne nyinaa ho bɛfiri ama mo.
Na mo Farisifoɔ, monnue sɛ momma ɛme ne nunum ne fan nyinaa so ntotosoɔ du du, na mogya atemmuo ne Nyankopɔn dɔ hɔ. Yei na anka ɛsɛ sɛ moyɛ, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mogya deɛ ɛka ho no hɔ.
Mo Farisifoɔ, monnue, sɛ mopɛ mpanimfoɔ tenaberɛ wɔ hyia adan mu ne edwa mu nkyea.
Monnue sɛ mote sɛ nnamena a ɛnna adie, na nnipa a wɔnam soɔ no nhunu.

verse.content: Na mmarakyerɛfoɔ no mu baako buaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, woka saa a, na worebɔ yɛn nso adapaa.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mo mmarakyerɛfoɔ nso, monnue sɛ mode nnesoa a ne soa yɛ ya soa nnipa, na mo ankasa deɛ, momfa mo nsateaa mu baako mpo nka nnesoa no.
Monnue sɛ moto adiyifoɔ a mo agyanom na ekumm wɔn nna soɔ.
Sɛdeɛ modi mo agyanom nnwuma ho adanseɛ na mopene ne no, sɛ wɔn na wɔkumm wɔn, na mo nso na moto wɔn nna soɔ.
Yei nti nso na Nyankopɔn nyansa no se: Mɛsoma adiyifoɔ ne asomafoɔ akɔ wɔn mu, na wɔakum na wɔataa wɔn mu binom,
na wɔahwehwɛ adiyifoɔ nyinaa mogya a wɔhwie guiɛ firi wiase asehyɛ so wɔ nnɛ mma yi nsam,
ɛfiri Habel mogya so de kɔsi Sakaria a ɔtɔɔ afɔrebukyia ne asɔredan ntam no mogya so. Aane, mese mo sɛ, wɔbɛhwehwɛ wɔ nnɛ mma yi nsam.
Mo mmarakyerɛfoɔ, monnue sɛ moafa nimdeɛ safoa; mo ara moankɔ mu, na wɔn a wɔrekɔ mu no nso, mosii wɔn kwan.

verse.content: Na ɔfiri hɔ kɔeɛ no, Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no fitii aseɛ hyɛɛ no so pii, na wɔhyɛɛ no kasa wɔ nsɛm bebree ho,
na wɔtɛɛ no hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛnya n’anom asɛm bi.

note.content: Tete atwerɛfoɔ no binom mfa yei nka ho.

verse.content: Berɛ no mu ara a nkurɔfokuo mpempem aboaboa wɔn ano na mpo wɔtiatia wɔn ho soɔ no, ɔfitii aseɛ ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no kane sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ mo ho yie Farisifoɔ mmɔka a ɛne nyaatwom no ho!
Na biribiara nni hɔ a ɛso akata a wɔrenyi soɔ, anaa ahunta a wɔrenhunu.
Enti biribiara a moaka no esum mu no, wɔbɛte no hann mu, na deɛ moaka no aso mu wɔ mpia mu no, wɔbɛpae mu aka wɔ adan atifi.
Na me nnamfonom, mese mo sɛ: Monnsuro wɔn a wɔkum honam, na yei akyiri no, wɔnni biribi a wɔbɛtumi ayɛ bio.
Na mɛkyerɛ mo deɛ monsuro no; monsuro deɛ ɔkum wie a, ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔde bɛkɔ akɔto amanehunu kurom; aane, mese mo sɛ: Oyi na monsuro no!
Ɛnyɛ mpatuprɛ nnum na wɔtɔn gye mpɛsewa mmienu? Nso Nyankopɔn anim deɛ, ani mpa wɔn mu baako mpo so.
Na mo tirinwi mpo wɔakan ne nyinaa. Enti monnsuro, mosene mpatuprɛ bebree.
Nso mese mo sɛ: Obiara a ɔbɛbɔ me din nnipa anim no, Onipa Ba no nso bɛbɔ ne din Nyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim.
Na deɛ ɔbɛpa me nnipa anim no, wɔbɛpa no Nyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim.
Na obiara a ɔbɛka asɛm bi atia Onipa Ba no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no; na deɛ ɔbɛka abususɛm atia Honhom Kronkron no, wɔremfa nkyɛ no.
Na sɛ wɔde mo kɔ hyia adan mu ne mpanimfoɔ ne atumfoɔ anim a, monnwennwene deɛ mode bɛyi mo ano anaasɛ deɛ mobɛka ho,
ɛfiri sɛ dɔn no ara mu na Honhom Kronkron bɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ moka.

verse.content: Na onipa bi a ɔfiri nkurɔfokuo no mu see no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, kasa kyerɛ me nua na ɔne me nkyɛ awunnyadeɛ.
Na ɔbisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa, hwan na ɔde me sii mo so sɛnnifoɔ anaa ɔdekyɛfoɔ?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monhwɛ na monhwɛ mo ho yie pɛpɛɛ ho! Na ɛnyɛ onipa adeɛ a wanya na aboro soɔ no mu na ne nkwa wɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu wɔn bɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa bi a ɔyɛ ɔdefoɔ asase soo aba pii.
Na ɔsusuu ne tirim sɛ: Menyɛ dɛn? Ɛfiri sɛ, menni deɛ mede me nnɔbaeɛ bɛsie.
Na ɔse: Deɛ meyɛ nie, mɛdwiri m’asan, na masi akɛseɛ; na ɛhɔ na mede me nnɔbaeɛ nyinaa ne me nnoɔma bɛsie,
na maka makyerɛ me kra sɛ: Ɔkra, wowɔ nnoɔma pa pii a wɔde asie ama mfirinhyia pii. Home, didi, nom, na wo bo ntɔ wo yam!
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɔkwasea, anadwo yi wɔbɛgye wo kra afiri wo nsam; na nnoɔma a wɔasiesie no bɛyɛ hwan dea?
Saa ara na deɛ ɔhyehyɛ agyapadeɛ ma ne ho, na ɔnyɛ ɔdefoɔ wɔ Nyankopɔn fam no teɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Yei nti mese mo sɛ: Monnwennwene mo kra ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛdie anaa mo nipadua ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛfira.
Ɔkra sene aduane, na nipadua sene ntoma.
Monhwɛ anene sɛ wɔnguo na wɔntwa, na wɔnni adekoradan anaa ɔsan; nanso Onyankopɔn yɛne wɔn. Sene bɛn na monsene nnomaa!
Na mo mu hwan na ɔbɛtumi adwendwene de basafa baako ato ne tentene soɔ?
Na sɛ montumi nyɛ ade ketewa a ɛte sɛɛ mpo a, adɛn na modwendwene deɛ aka ho?
Monhwɛ sukooko sɛdeɛ ɛnyini; ɛnyɛ adwuma, nso ɛnto asaawa; nanso mese mo sɛ, Salomo animuonyam nyinaa mu mpo n’ahosiesie anto yeinom mu baako.
Na sɛ Onyankopɔn ma wira mu ahahan a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ na ɔkyena wɔde agu fononoo mu no ntoma saa a, mprɛ ahe na ɔremma mo, mo a mo gyidie sua?
Na mo deɛ, monnhwehwɛ deɛ mobɛdie anaasɛ deɛ mobɛnom, na mommma mo ani nnyɛ mo totɔtotɔ!
Na yeinom nyinaa akyi na wiase amanaman die; na mo Agya nim sɛ nnoɔma yi hia mo.
Na mmom monhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie, na wɔde yeinom nyinaa bɛka mo ho.
Kuo ketewa, monnsuro! Ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ mo Agya no fɛ sɛ ɔde ahennie no bɛma mo.
Montɔn deɛ mowɔ mfa nyɛ adɔeɛ, monyɛ sika nkotokuo a ɛrenyɛ dada mfa, ɛne agyapadeɛ a ɛrensa da ɔsoro, deɛ owifoɔ mma ho, na nweweboaa nsɛe no.
Na deɛ mo agyapadeɛ wɔ no, ɛhɔ na mo akoma nso wɔ.
Mommɔ abɔsoɔ, na momma mo akanea nnɛre;
na monyɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔretwɛn da ko a wɔn wura bɛfiri ayeforɔ ase aba, na sɛ ɔba na ɔbɛbɔ mu a, wɔahini no ntɛmntɛm.
Nhyira ne nkoa no a owura no ba a, ɔbɛto wɔn sɛ wɔrewɛn. Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ɔbɛbɔ n’abɔsoɔ, na wama wɔatena adidiiɛ, na waba abɛsom wɔn.
Na sɛ ɔba ɔdasuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa mu na ɔbɛto wɔn saa a, nhyira ne wɔn!
Na monhunu yei sɛ, sɛ efiewura nim dɔn ko a owifoɔ bɛba a, anka wamma wɔammɛtu ne dan ase anhyɛne mu.
Enti mo nso, monsiesie mo ho nsie, ɛfiri sɛ dɔn a monsusuo mu na Onipa Ba no bɛba.

verse.content: Na Petro see no sɛ: Awurade, yɛn nko na wobu yɛn bɛ yi anaasɛ wobu kyerɛ wɔn nyinaa nso?
Na Awurade se:

wj.content: Hwan ne efiepanin nokwafoɔ ne ɔbadwemma a ne wura de no bɛdi ne fiefoɔ so, sɛ ɔmma wɔn wɔn aduane berɛ a ɛsɛ mu?
Nhyira ne akoa no a ne wura ba a, ɔbɛhu no sɛ ɔreyɛ saa.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ɔbɛma no adi deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa so.
Na sɛ akoa no se n’akomam sɛ: Me wura akyɛre ne ba, na ɔfiri aseɛ boro asomfoɔ ne mmaawa no, na ɔdidi na ɔnom boro a,
akoa no wura bɛba da a ɔnhwɛ no kwan ne dɔn a ɔnnim mu, na wabɛtwa ne mu mmienu, na wama ɔno ne akyinnyegyefoɔ anya kyɛfa korɔ.
Na akoa no a ɔnim deɛ ne wura pɛ na wansiesie ne ho na wanyɛ sɛdeɛ ɔpɛ no, wɔbɛhwe no mmaa pii.
Na deɛ ɔnnim na ɔyɛ ahwedeɛ no, wɔbɛhwe no kakraa bi. Na obiara a wɔama no pii no, ne nkyɛn na wɔbɛhwehwɛ pii; na deɛ wɔde pii ahyɛ ne nsa no, ɔno na wɔbɛbisa no deɛ ɛboro soɔ.
Mebaa sɛ merebɛma ogya asɔ asase soɔ, na sɛ asɔ dada a, ɛdeɛn na merehwehwɛ sene yei?
Asubɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔde bɛbɔ me, na me ho yera me kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie bɔ!
Mosusu sɛ mebaa sɛ merebɛma asomdwoeɛ asase so? Ɛnte saa, na mmom mpaepaemu.
Na ɛfiri nnɛ, efie koro mu nnipa baanum bɛdi mpaepaemu, na baasa ne baanu anya, na baanu ne baasa anya.
Wɔbɛdi mpaepaemu
na agya ne ne ba anya,
na ɔba ne agya anya;
na ɛna ne ne babaa anya,
na ɔbabaa ne ɛna anya,
na aseɛ ne n’asebaa anya,
na asebaa ne n’ase anya.

verse.content: Na ɔsee nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no nso sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ mohunu sɛ osuo amuna atɔeɛ fam a, ntɛm ara na mose: Osuo reba; na ɛba saa.
Na mohunu sɛ anafoɔ mframa rebɔ a, mose: Ahuhuro reba; na ɛba mu.
Nyaatwomfoɔ! Monim asase ne ɔsoro ani nnoɔma asekyerɛ, na adɛn na monhunu berɛ yi asekyerɛ?
Na adɛn na mo ara nso mommu deɛ ɛtene ho atɛn?

Na sɛ wo ne wo nkurobɔfoɔ rekɔ otumfoɔ anim a, wo ne no wɔ ɔkwan mu no, bɔ mmɔden gye wo ho firi ne nsam, na wantwe wo ankɔhyɛ ɔtemmufoɔ nsa, na ɔtemmufoɔ no amfa wo amma ofiasehwɛfoɔ, na ofiasehwɛfoɔ no amfa wo ankɔto afiase.
Nokorɛ mese wo sɛ: Woremfiri hɔ ara da, gye sɛ woatua kaprɛ a ɛbɛka akyire no mpo ansa.

verse.content: Saa berɛ no ara na nnipa bi a wɔwɔ hɔ kaa Galileafoɔ a Pilato de wɔn mogya frafraa wɔn afɔdeɛ mu ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mosusu sɛ Galileafoɔ yi hunuu saa amaneɛ yi nti na wɔyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene Galileafoɔ nyinaa?
Mese mo sɛ: Ɛnte saa, na mmom sɛ moansakyera mo adwene a, mo nyinaa bɛyera saa ara.
Anaasɛ nnipa dunwɔtwe a Siloa abantenten no bu hwee wɔn so na ɛkumm wɔn no, mosusu sɛ wɔyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene nnipa a wɔte Yerusalem nyinaa?
Mese mo sɛ: Ɛnte saa, na mmom sɛ moansakyera mo adwene a, mo nyinaa bɛyera saa ara.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ:

wj.content: Obi wɔ borɔdɔma a wadua wɔ ne bobe turom; na ɔba bɛhwehwɛɛ so aba, na wannya bi.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ turomhwɛfoɔ no sɛ: Hwɛ, mfirinhyia mmiɛnsa ni a maba mabɛhwehwɛ borɔdɔma yi so aba, na mannya bie. Twa twene! Adɛn nti na agye asase no akɛntɛne soɔ?
Na ɔbua see no sɛ: Owura, ma no nsi hɔ afe yi nso nkɔsi sɛ mɛfunifuni ho na magu aseɛ sumina.
Na ebia ɛbɛso; na sɛ anso ansa a, woatwa atwene.

verse.content: Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hyiadan bi mu homeda.
Na hwɛ, na ɔbaa bi wɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ ahoɔmmerɛ honhom mfirinhyia dunwɔtwe, na wapono a ɔntumi ntene ne mu koraa mpo.
Na Yesu hunuu no no, ɔfrɛɛ no, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa wɔasane wo afiri w’ahoɔmmerɛ mu.

verse.content: Na ɔde ne nsa guu ne so, na amonom hɔ ara ɔtenee, na ɔyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
Na hyiadan no mu panin a ɛyɛɛ no ahi sɛ Yesu saa yadeɛ homeda no bua see nkurɔfokuo no sɛ: Nnansia wɔ hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa yɛ adwuma; emu na mommra na wɔnsa mo yadeɛ, na ɛnyɛ homeda.
Na Awurade buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Nyaatwomfoɔ! Mo mu biara nsane ne nantwie anaa n’afunumu mfiri n’adididaka ho mma no nkɔnom nsuo homeda?
Na hwɛ, ɔbaa yi a ɔyɛ Abraham babaa a Satan akyekyere no mfirinhyia dunwɔtwe yi, ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsane no firi kyekyerɛ yi mu homeda?

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, n’atamfoɔ no nyinaa ani wuiɛ, na nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa ani gyee animuonyam adeɛ a ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa nti.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Adeɛ bɛn na Nyankopɔn ahennie sɛ no anaasɛ ɛdeɛn ho na mede bɛtoɔ?
Ɛte sɛ sinapi fua a onipa fa kɔduaa wɔ ne turom; na ɛnyinii, na ɛyɛɛ dua, na ewiem nnomaa bɛsisii ne mman so.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa bio sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn ho na mede Nyankopɔn ahennie bɛtoɔ?
Ɛte sɛ mmɔka a ɔbaa bi fa kɔfetee no esiam nkorokuma mmiɛnsa mu de kɔsii sɛ ne nyinaa kaeɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔnenam nkuro mu ne nkuraa ase rekyerɛkyerɛ, na na ɔnam so rekɔ Yerusalem.
Na obi bisaa no sɛ: Awurade, wɔn a wɔbɛgye wɔn yɛ kakraa bi anaa?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mompere nhyɛne ɛpono teateaa no mu! Na mese mo sɛ: Nnipa pii bɛhwehwɛ mu ahyɛne, na wɔrentumi.
Ɛfiri berɛ a efiewura no bɛsɔre ato pono mu no ara na mobɛfiri aseɛ agyina akyire, na moabɔ ɛpono no mu sɛ: Owura, hini yɛn! Na ɔbɛbua mo sɛ: Mo deɛ, mennim deɛ mofire.
Ɛnna mobɛfiri aseɛ aka sɛ: Yɛadidi na yɛanom w’anim, na woakyerɛkyerɛ wɔ yɛn mmɔntene so pɛn.
Na ɔbɛka sɛ: Mo deɛ, mennim deɛ mofire. Momfiri me so, mo a moyɛ deɛ ɛntene nyinaa!
Ɛhɔ na mobɛsu atwɛre mo se sɛ mohunu Abraham, Isak ne Yakob ne adiyifoɔ no nyinaa Nyankopɔn ahennie mu, na mo deɛ, wɔapam mo afiri mu.
Na wɔbɛfiri apueeɛ, atɔeɛ, atifi ne anafoɔ aba abɛtena adidiiɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.
Na hwɛ, akyikafoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛdi kan, na adikanfoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛka akyire.

verse.content: Dɔn no ara mu na Farisifoɔ bi ba bɛsee no sɛ: Firi ha kɔ! Na Herode repɛ wo aku wo.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔka nkyerɛ sakraman no sɛ: Hwɛ, metu ahonhommɔne, na mesa yadeɛ nnɛ ne ɔkyena, ne n’adekyeeɛ na mawie.
Nanso ɛsɛ sɛ menante nnɛ ne ɔkyena ne n’adekyeeɛ; na ɛnni ho kwan sɛ odiyifoɔ bi bɛtɔ baabi, gye Yerusalem.
O Yerusalem, Yerusalem a wokum adiyifoɔ na wosii wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn wo nkyɛn no aboɔ! Mprɛ ahe nie a mepɛɛ sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano sɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban aseɛ, nanso moampɛ.
Hwɛ, wɔbɛgya mo fie fituo ama mo. Na mese mo sɛ: Morenhu me, gye da a ɛbɛba sɛ mobɛka sɛ: Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ homeda bi, ɔkɔɔ Farisifoɔ panin bi fie no, na wɔretɛ no.
Na hwɛ, na onipa bi wɔ n’anim a ɔyare sasaborɔ.
Na Yesu see mmarakyerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no sɛ: Ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔsa yadeɛ homeda anaasɛ wɔnsa?
Na wɔyɛɛ komm. Na ɔfaa no saa no yadeɛ, na ɔmaa no kɔe.
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ: Mo mu hwan afunumu anaa nantwie na ɔkɔtɔ abura mu a, ɔrenkɔtwe no ntɛmntɛm homeda?
Na wɔantumi ammua no yeinom ho bi bio.
Na ɔde n’ani karii wɔn a wɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn adidie no sɛdeɛ wɔpa mu yi mpanimfoɔ tenaberɛ no, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:
Sɛ obi to nsa frɛ wo ayeforɔ ase a, nkɔtena mpanimfoɔ tenaberɛ! Ebia wɔato nsa afrɛ deɛ n’anim yɛ nyam sene woɔ.
Na deɛ ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wo ne no no ba a, ɔbɛka akyerɛ wo sɛ: Ma oyi kwan! Na ɛno na wode aniwuo bɛfiri aseɛ akɔfa akyire tenaberɛ.
Na sɛ wɔto nsa frɛ wo a, kɔ na kɔtena akyire tenaberɛ! Na deɛ ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ woɔ no ba a, waka akyerɛ wo sɛ: Damfo, twi kɔ soro nohoa! Ɛno na wobɛnya anidie wɔn a wɔne wo te adidiiɛ no anim.
Na obiara a ɔma ne ho soɔ no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase; na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho aseɛ no, wɔbɛma no so.

Na ɔsee deɛ ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ no no nso sɛ: Sɛ woto pono awia anaa anwummerɛ a, mfrɛ wo nnamfo anaa wo nuanom anaa w’abusuafoɔ anaa afipamfoɔ adefoɔ! Na wɔn nso ammɛto nsa amfrɛ wo bi, na woannya so akatua.
Na woto pono a, frɛ ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, mpakye ne anifirafoɔ,
na woanya nhyira; ɛfiri sɛ wɔnni deɛ wɔde bɛtua wo so ka. Na ateneneefoɔ sɔreɛ mu na wɔbɛtua wo so ka.
Na wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no mu baako tee saa no, ɔsee no sɛ: Nhyira ne deɛ ɔbɛdidi Nyankopɔn ahennie mu!
Na Yesu see no sɛ: Onipa bi too pono kɛseɛ, na ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ nnipa pii.
Na adidi berɛ duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa n’akoa sɛ ɔnkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn a wɔato nsa afrɛ wɔn no sɛ: Mommra, na wɔasiesie nnoɔma awie.
Na wɔn nyinaa firi aseɛ kaa asɛnkorɔ yiyii wɔn ano. Deɛ ɔdi kan see no sɛ: Matɔ afuo, na ɛhia sɛ mekɔhwɛ; mesrɛ wo, yi me firi mu!
Na ɔfoforɔ se: Matɔ anantwie mpamho nnum, na merekɔsɔ wɔn mahwɛ; mesrɛ wo, yi me firi mu!
Na ɔfoforɔ se: Maware yere, enti merentumi memma.

Na akoa no ba bɛkaa nsɛm no kyerɛɛ ne wura. Ɛnna efiewura no bo fuiɛ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’akoa no sɛ: Firi adi ntɛm, kɔ kuro no mmɔntene so ne mmantɛmo, na kɔfa ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, anifirafoɔ ne mpakye bra!
Na akoa no se: Owura, mayɛ sɛdeɛ wohyɛeɛ no, nanso ɛfa da so wɔ hɔ.
Na owura no ka kyerɛɛ akoa no sɛ: Firi adi kɔ akwan so ne ban ho, na kɔhyɛ wɔn na wɔmmra, na me fie ha nyɛ ma.
Na mese mo sɛ: Nnipa a wɔato nsa afrɛ wɔn no mu biara renka m’aduane no nhwɛ.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii ne no nam. Na ɔdanee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:
Sɛ obi ba me nkyɛn, na ɔntane n’agya ne ne na ne ne yere ne ne mma ne ne nuammarimanom ne ne nuammaanom ne ɔno ara ne ho nso a, ɔntumi nyɛ me suani.
Na obiara a ɔnsoa n’asɛnnua na ɔnni m’akyire no, ɔntumi nyɛ me suani.
Na mo mu hwan na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔto abantenten, na ɔrentena ase mmu ho nkonta ansa, sɛ ɔwɔ deɛ ɔde bɛtumi awie?
Ebia wafiri aseɛ no, wantumi anwie a, wɔn a wɔhunu nyinaa bɛfiri aseɛ agoro ne ho
sɛ: Onipa yi firii aseɛ toe, na wantumi anwie.
Anaasɛ ɔhene bɛn na ɔne ɔhene bi rekɔko, na ɔntena ase nnwene ho kane, sɛ ɔbɛtumi de ɔpedu akɔhyia deɛ ɔde ɔpeduonu reba ne soɔ no?
Anyɛ saa a, ɔbaako no wɔ akyirikyiri no, ɔtu abɔfoɔ kɔsrɛ sɛ wɔmpata.
Saa ara nso na mo mu biara a ɔnnya deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa hɔ ntumi nyɛ me suani.
Nkyene yɛ; nanso sɛ nkyene dɛ tu a, ɛdeɛn na sɛ wɔde to mu a ɛbɛma no ayɛ dɛ bio?
Ɛmfata fam anaa sumina so, na wɔto gu. Deɛ ɔwɔ aso bɛtie no, ma no ntie!
Na togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ no nyinaa twi bɛnee no sɛ wɔrebɛtie no.
Na Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no nwiinwii kaa sɛ: Oyi gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ, na ɔne wɔn didi.
Enti ɔbuu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ:

wj.content: Mo mu nipa bɛn na sɛ ɔwɔ nnwanten ɔha na wɔn mu baako kɔyera a, ɔrennya aduɔkron nkron no ɛserɛ soɔ, na ɔnni deɛ wayera no akyi nkɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhu no?
Na sɛ ɔhu no a, ɔde no bɔ ne kɔn ho, na n’ani gye.
Na ɔba fie a, ɔfrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne n’afipamfoɔ boa ano ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mo ne me ani nnye, ɛfiri sɛ mahunu me dwan a ɔyeraeɛ no.
Mese mo sɛ: Saa ara na anigyeɛ bɛba soro, ɔdebɔneyɛni baako a ɔsakyera n’adwene ho, sene nnipa tenenee aduɔkron nkron a ɛnhia wɔn adwensakyera.
Anaasɛ ɔbaa bɛn na ɔwɔ nnwetɛbena du, na emu baako yera a, ɔrensɔ kanea, na ɔmpra ɛdan no mu, na ɔnhwehwɛ yie nkɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhunu?
Na ɔhunu a, ɔfrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne n’afipamfoɔ boa ano, na ɔka sɛ: Mo ne me ani nnye, ɛfiri sɛ mahunu me dwetɛbena a ɛyeraeɛ no.
Saa ara na mese mo sɛ: Anigyeɛ ba Nyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim ɔdebɔneyɛni baako a ɔsakyera n’adwene ho.
Na ɔse: Onipa bi wɔ mmammarima baanu.
Na wɔn mu akumaa no ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: Agya, fa ahodeɛ a ɛbɛyɛ me dea no ma me! Na ɔkyɛɛ n’asetenadeɛ mu maa wɔn.
Na anni da bi na ɔba kumaa no boaboaa ne nyinaa ano, na ɔtuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri asase bi soɔ; ɛhɔ na ɔkɔbɔɔ ahohwie sɛee n’ahodeɛ nyinaa.
Na ɔhweree ne nyinaa wieeɛ no, ɛkɔm kɛseɛ bi baa asase no so, na ɛfirii aseɛ hiaa no.
Na ɔde ne ho kɔdanee asase no so hɔni bi; na ɔmaa no kɔɔ ne mfuo mu kɔhwɛɛ mprako.
Na ne kɔn dɔɔ sɛ ɔde asɛhono a mprako no die no bi hyɛ n’afuru ma; nanso obiara amma no.
Na n’ani baa ne ho soɔ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Apaafoɔ ahe na m’agya nnie a wɔnnya aduane ma no mmoro soɔ; na me deɛ, ɛkɔm rekum me yi?
Mɛsɔre makɔ m’agya nkyɛn, na mase no sɛ: Agya, mayɛ ɔsoro ne w’anim bɔne,
na memfata sɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio, na yɛ me sɛ w’apaafoɔ no mu baako!
Na ɔsɔre baa n’agya nkyɛn. Na ɔda so wɔ akyirikyiri no, n’agya hunuu no, na ne yam hyehyee no, na ɔtutuu mmirika kɔyɛɛ no atuu, na ɔfee n’ano.
Na ɔba no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Agya, mayɛ ɔsoro ne w’anim bɔne, na memfata sɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio.
Ɛnna agya no ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: Momfa atadeɛ a ɛyɛ no mmra mmɛhyɛ no, na momfa pɛtea nhyɛ ne nsa ne mpaboa nhyɛ ne nan;
na momfa nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no mmra mmɛkum no, na yɛnni, na yɛn ani nnye,
ɛfiri sɛ, me ba yi wui, na wanyane bio; ɔyerae, na wɔahu no. Na wɔfirii aseɛ gyee wɔn ani.
Na ne ba panin no wɔ afuom; na ɔreba na ɔbɛn fie no, ɔtee sankuo ne asa.
Na ɔfrɛɛ asomfoɔ no mu baako bisaa no asɛm ko a asie.
Na ɔsee no sɛ: Wo nua aba, na w’agya akum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ ne nsa aka no nkwahosan mu.
Na ne bo fui, na wampɛ sɛ ɔkɔ mu. Ɛnna n’agya firii adi bɛkorɔkorɔɔ no.
Na ɔbua see agya no sɛ: Hwɛ mfirinhyia dodoɔ yi a mede masom woɔ, nso mentoo wo mmara da; nanso wommaa me abirekyie ba bi sɛ me ne me nnamfonom mfa nkɔgye yɛn ani da.
Na wo ba yi a ɔne nnwamamfoɔ adi w’ahodeɛ no baeɛ ara pɛ deɛ, woakum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no ama no.
Na ɔsee no sɛ: Ɔba, wowɔ me nkyɛn daa, na deɛ mewɔ nyinaa yɛ wo dea.
Na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn ani gyeɛ na yɛn bo tɔ yɛn yam, ɛfiri sɛ wo nua yi wui, na wanyane; ɔyerae, na wɔahu no.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ no nso sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ efiepanin bi, na wɔkɔbɔɔ no kwaadu sɛ ɔsɛe n’adeɛ.
Na ɔfrɛɛ no see no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na mete no wo ho yi? Bɛbu wo paninnie ho nkonta, na worenni panin bio.
Na efiepanin no kaa ne tirim sɛ: Menyɛ dɛn? Ɛfiri sɛ me wura rebɛgye me paninnie afiri me nsam. Menni ahoɔden a mede mɛtutuo, na ahwa nso yɛ me aniwuo.
Aane, mahunu deɛ mɛyɛ, na wɔtu me firi me paninnie so a, wɔagye me akɔ wɔn afie.
Na ɔfrɛɛ ne wura adefirifoɔ nyinaa mmaako mmaako baa ne nkyɛn see deɛ ɔdi kan no sɛ: Wode me wura ɛka ahe?
Na ɔse: Ngohina ɔha. Na ɔsee no sɛ: Gye wo nwoma, na tena ase ntɛm twerɛ aduonum!
Ɛnna ɔsee ɔfoforɔ sɛ: Na wo nso, ɛka ahe na wodeɛ? Na ɔse: Mede ayuo nkotokuo ɔha. Na ɔsee no sɛ: Fa wo nwoma na twerɛ aduɔwɔtwe!
Na owura no kamfoo efiepanin oniteɛfoɔ no sɛ wadi no nyansam; yei mpo kyerɛ sɛ, wiase yi mma wɔ nyansa sene hann mma wɔn mfɛfoɔ mu.
Na me nso mese mo sɛ, momfa ahonyadeɛ
a ɛntene no bi so nya nnamfoɔ, na sɛ ɛhia mo a, wɔagye mo akɔ daa afie no mu.
Deɛ ɔdi ade ketewa mu nokorɛ no di pii mu nokorɛ; na deɛ ɔntene adeɛ ketewa mu no, na ɔntene bebree mu nso.
Na enti sɛ moanni ahonyadeɛ a ɛntene no mu nokorɛ a, hwan na ɔde ahodeɛ pa no bɛhyɛ mo nsa?
Na sɛ moanni obi adeɛ mu nokorɛ a, hwan na ɔde mo deɛ bɛma mo?
Akoa biara ntumi nsom awuranom baanu. Na ɔbɛtane ɔbaako, na wadɔ ɔbaako no, anaasɛ ɔbɛbata ɔbaako ho, na wabu ɔbaako no animtia. Montumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne ahonyadeɛ.

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no a wɔyɛ sikapɛfoɔ tee yeinom nyinaa; na wɔseree no.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Moyɛ wɔn a wɔbu wɔn ho bem nnipa anim, nanso Onyankopɔn deɛ, ɔnim mo akoma mu. Na deɛ ɛyɛ kɛseɛ nnipa mu no yɛ akyiwadeɛ Nyankopɔn anim.
Mmara ne adiyifoɔ no bɛpem Yohane so; na ɛfiri ɛno soɔ no, wɔka Nyankopɔn ahennie ho asɛmpa, na obiara nam anibereɛ so kɔ mu.
Na ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam sene sɛ mmara no ho nsensaneeɛ ketewa baako bɛtɔ.
Obiara a ɔgyae ne yere na ɔware ɔfoforɔ no sɛe awadeɛ; na obiara a ɔware deɛ ne kunu agyae no no sɛe awadeɛ.
Na ɔdefoɔ bi tenaa ase a na ɔhyɛ atadeɛ pa a ne boɔ yɛ den, na ɔde asetena fɛfɛ gyee n’ani daa.
Na ohiani bi a watutu akuro nso tenaa ase a wɔfrɛ no Lasaro a wɔde no akɔto n’aboboano.
Na ne kɔn dɔɔ sɛ ɔdi mporoporowa a ɛfiri ɔdefoɔ no pono soɔ agu fam no meeɛ; nanso akraman ba bɛtaferee n’akuro mu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ohiani no wui, na abɔfoɔ bɛsoaa no kɔɔ Abraham kokom. Na ɔdefoɔ no nso wui, na wɔsiee no.
Na ɔmaa n’ani soɔ wɔ Asamando no, na ɔwɔ aninyanneɛ mu, na ɔhunuu Abraham akyirikyiri ne Lasaro sɛ ɔtwere ne kokom.
Na ɔteaa mu sɛ: Agya Abraham, hu me mmɔbɔ, na soma Lasaro ma no mfa ne nsateaa ano nkɔbɔ nsuo mu, na ɔmfa mmɛdwodwo me tɛkyerɛma; na merehunu amane ogyaframa yi mu.
Na Abraham se: Ɔba, kae sɛ wote aseɛ no, wonyaa ahotɔ, na Lasaro nso deɛ, ɔhunuu amane; afei na ne werɛ akyekyerɛ, na wo nso, worehunu amaneɛ.
Na yei nyinaa nna nkyɛn, eku kɛseɛ da yɛne mo ntam a, wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfiri ha yi ba mo nkyɛn ntumi mma, na wɔn nso a wɔwɔ nohoa ntumi ntra mma yɛn nkyɛn.
Na ɔse: Ɛnneɛ, agya mesrɛ wo sɛ, soma no ma no nkɔ m’agya fie;
na mewɔ nuammarimanom baanum, na ɔnkɔdi wɔn adanseɛ, na wɔn nso amma aninyanneɛ mu ha yi bi.
Na Abraham kaa sɛ: Wɔwɔ Mose ne adiyifoɔ no; ma wɔntie wɔn!
Na ɔse: Dabi, agya Abraham, na sɛ obi firi awufoɔ mu kɔ wɔn nkyɛn a, ɛnna wɔbɛsakyera wɔn adwene.
Na ɔsee no sɛ: Sɛ wɔantie Mose ne adiyifoɔ no a, obi firi awufoɔ mu sɔre mpo a, wɔrennye no nni.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdane sɛ deɛn ara a, suntiduatoɔ bɛba deɛ, nanso deɛ ɛnam ne so bɛba no nnue!
Anka ɛyɛ ma no sɛ wɔde ayuyammoɔ kyekyere ne kɔn mu kɔto no twene ɛpo mu sene sɛ ɔbɛto nketewa yi mu baako suntidua.
Monhwɛ mo ho yie! Na sɛ wo nua fom a, ka n’anim; na sɛ ɔsakyera n’adwene a, fa kyɛ no!
Na sɛ ɔfom wo mprɛnson da koro, na ɔsane ba wo nkyɛn mprɛnson ka sɛ: Masakyera m’adwene a, fa kyɛ no!

verse.content: Na asomafoɔ no see Awurade sɛ: To yɛn gyidie mu!
Na Awurade se:

wj.content: Sɛ mowɔ gyidie sɛ sinapi fua a, anka mobɛka akyerɛ akyee yi sɛ: Wo nhini ntutu na kɔtim ɛpo mu! Na ɛbɛtie mo.
Mo mu hwan na ɔwɔ akoa a ɔfuntum asase anaasɛ ɔhwɛ mmoa, na ɔfiri afuom ba fie a, ɔbɛse no sɛ: Bɛsene ntɛm kɔtena adidiiɛ?
Na ɔrense no sɛ: Siesie deɛ mɛdie, na bɔ abɔsoɔ bɛsom me, na mennidi na mennom ansa, na akyire yi no, wo nso woakɔdidi na woanom?
Ɔbɛda akoa no ase sɛ wayɛ deɛ wɔahyɛ no no?
Saa ara na mo nso sɛ moyɛ deɛ wɔahyɛ mo nyinaa a, monka sɛ: Yɛyɛ nkoa a mfasoɔ nni yɛn so; yɛayɛ deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔrekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔfaa Samaria ne Galilea.
Na ɔrekɔ akuraa bi aseɛ no, mmarima du bi a wɔyɛ akwatafoɔ hyiaa no a wɔgyinagyina akyirikyiri,
na wɔmaa wɔn nne so sɛ: Owura Yesu, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ!
Na ɔhunuu wɔn no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ mfa mo ho nkɔkyerɛ asɔfoɔ.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔrekorɔ no, wɔn ho fiiɛ.
