Na wɔn mu baako hunuu sɛ ne ho asan no no, ɔsanee n’akyi de nne kɛseɛ bɛyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ,
na ɔde n’anim butuu fam wɔ ne nan ase daa no ase. Ɔno deɛ, na ɔyɛ Samariani.
Na Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ du no na wɔn ho fiiɛ? Na baakron no deɛ, wɔwɔ he?
Wɔanhunu wɔn mu biara a ɔsane de animuonyam brɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔnanani yi nko?

verse.content: Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɔre kɔ, wo gyidie agye wo.

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no bisaa no sɛ da bɛn na Nyankopɔn ahennie bɛba no, ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nyankopɔn ahennie mma sɛ ani tua,
nanso wɔrenka sɛ: Hwɛ ha anaa ɛhɔ! Na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn ahennie no, mo mu na ɛwɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nna bi bɛba a mobɛpɛ sɛ mobɛhunu Onipa Ba no nna no mu baako, na morenhunu.
Na wɔbɛse mo sɛ: Hwɛ ha! anaa: Hwɛ hɔ! a, monnkɔ, nso monnni wɔn akyi!
Na sɛdeɛ anyinam a ɛpa te ɔsoro ase fa hyerɛn kɔ ɔsoro ase, fa baabi no, saa ara nso na Onipa Ba no bɛyɛ ne da no mu.
Nanso ɛtwa sɛ ɔbɛhunu amane pii na nnɛ mma yi po no ansa.
Na sɛdeɛ ɛyɛɛ Noa nna no mu no, saa ara nso na ɛbɛyɛ Onipa Ba no nna mu.
Wɔdidii, wɔnomee, wɔwaree yerenom na wɔmaa awadeɛ de kɔsii da a Noa hyɛnee adaka no mu, na nsuyire no baeɛ, na ɛbɛsɛee wɔn nyinaa.
Sɛ nso ɛyɛɛ Lot nna mu ne no, wɔdidii, na wɔnomee, wɔtɔe, wɔtɔnee, wɔduae, na wɔtotoo adan.
Na da a Lot firii Sodom kɔeɛ no, ogya ne sɔfe firi soro tɔeɛ, na ɛbɛsɛee wɔn nyinaa.
Saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ ɛda a Onipa Ba no bɛyi ne ho adie no.
Da no ara, deɛ ɔwɔ ɛdan atifi na ne biribi wɔ ɛdan mu no, mma no nnsiane mmmɛfa; na deɛ ɔwɔ afuo mu no nso, mma no nnsane n’akyi.
Monkae Lot yere no!
Obiara a ɔbɛhwehwɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa, na obiara a ne kra bɛfiri ne nsa no ɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Mese mo sɛ: Anadwo no, nnipa baanu bɛda mpa korɔ so; wɔbɛfa ɔbaako, na wɔagya ɔbaako.
Mmaa baanu bɛbom ayam ayuo; wɔbɛfa ɔbaako, na wɔagya ɔbaako.
[Mmarima baanu bɛtena afuom; wɔbɛfa ɔbaako, na wɔagya ɔbaako.]

verse.content: Na wɔbua see no sɛ: Ɛhe, Awurade? Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ efunu wɔ no, ɛhɔ na apɛtɛ bɛboaboa wɔn ano.

note.content: Tete Atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa nkyekyɛmu 36 nka ho.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu wɔn bɛ bi de kyerɛɛ sɛ ɛtwa sɛ nnipa bɔ mpaeɛ daa a wɔmmrɛ ho:

wj.content: Ɔtemmufoɔ bi tenaa kuro bi mu a ɔnsuro Onyankopɔn, nanso ɔmfɛre nnipa.
Na okunafoɔ bi nso tenaa kuro no mu, na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Bu atɛn gye me me tamfo nsam!
Na wampene maa no kyɛree kakra. Na akyire yi ɔkaa ne tirim sɛ: Mensuro Onyankopɔn na memfɛre nnipa deɛ,
nanso okunafoɔ yi ha me nti, mɛbu atɛn mama no, na wamfa ne ba a ɔba ha daa no ammɛdwan me ho.

verse.content: Na Awurade se:

wj.content: Montie deɛ ɔtemmufoɔ a ɔntene yi ka!
Na Onyankopɔn, sɛ ɔto ne bo ase kyɛre wɔn ho nso a, ɔremmu atɛn nnye wɔn a wayi wɔn a wɔsu frɛ no awia ne anadwo no anaa?
Mese mo sɛ, ɔbɛbu atɛn agye wɔn ntɛm. Nanso Onipa Ba no ba a, anka ɔbɛhunu gyidie asase so?

verse.content: Na ɔbuu binom a wɔde wɔn ho too wɔn ho soɔ sɛ wɔtene na wɔmmu wɔn a aka no bɛ yi sɛ:

wj.content: Nnipa baanu kɔɔ asɔrefie mpaebɔ; ɔbaako yɛ Farisini, na ɔbaako yɛ ɔtogyeni.
Farisini no gyinae, na ɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ ne tirim sɛ: Onyankopɔn, meda wo ase sɛ mente sɛdeɛ nnipa a aka no teɛ: Amimfoɔ, nkontompofoɔ, ayerefafoɔ anaa ɔtogyeni yi mpo.
Medi mmuada dapɛn mu mprenu, mede deɛ menya nyinaa so ntotosoɔ du du mema.
Na ɔtogyeni no deɛ, ɔgyinaa akyirikyiri, na wampɛ sɛ ɔma n’ani so kyerɛ soro mpo, na mmom ɔbɔɔ ne koko so kaa sɛ: Onyankopɔn, hu me debɔneyɛni mmɔbɔ!
Mese mo sɛ: Oyi de bem sane kɔɔ ne fie mmom sene ɔbaako no; na obiara a ɔma ne ho soɔ no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho aseɛ no, wɔbɛma no so.

verse.content: Na wɔde nkɔkoaa nso brɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka wɔn; na asuafoɔ no hunuiɛ no, wɔkaa wɔn anim.
Na Yesu frɛɛ mmɔfra no bae, see asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Momma mmɔfra no mmra me nkyɛn, na monnsi wɔn kwan! Na yeinom sɛɛ na Nyankopɔn ahennie no wɔ wɔn.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, obiara a ɔrennye Nyankopɔn ahennie sɛ abɔfra no, ɔrenkɔ mu koraa.

verse.content: Na ɔpanin bi bisaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ pa, ɛdeɛn na menyɛ na manya daa nkwa?
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na wofrɛ me papa? Obiara nyɛ papa gye ɔbaako, ɔne Onyankopɔn.
Wonim mmara nsɛm no: Nsɛe awadeɛ! Nni awu! Mmɔ korɔno! Nni adansekurumu! Di w’agya ne wo na ni!

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ: Yeinom nyinaa, mefiri me mmɔfraase na medii soɔ.
Na Yesu tee saa no, ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛda so ka wo adeɛ baako, kɔtɔn deɛ wowɔ nyinaa, na kyɛ ma ahiafoɔ, na wobɛnya agyapadeɛ wɔ soro, na bra bɛdi m’akyi!

verse.content: Na ɔtee yei no, ɛyɛɛ no awerɛho sɛ; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔyɛ ɔdefoɔ kɛseɛ.
Na Yesu hwɛɛ no kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ moahunu den a ɛyɛ ma asikafoɔ ne adefoɔ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu!
Na ɛyɛ mmerɛ ma yoma sɛ ɔbɛfa paneɛ aniwa mu sene sɛ ɔdefoɔ bɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔteeɛ no kaa sɛ: Ɛnneɛ hwan na wɔbɛtumi agye no nkwa?
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɛntumi nyɛ hɔ nnipa fam no, Nyankopɔn fam deɛ, ɛbɛtumi ayɛ hɔ.

verse.content: Na Petro se: Hwɛ, yɛagya ade nyinaa hɔ abɛdi w’akyi.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Obi nni hɔ a wagya efie anaa yerɛ anaa anuanom anaa awofoɔ anaa mma hɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie nti,
na ɔrennya no mmɔho pii ɛberɛ yi mu ne wiase a ɛreba no mu daa nkwa.

verse.content: Na ɔfaa dummienu no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, yɛrekɔ Yerusalem, na nnoɔma a adiyifoɔ no atwerɛ afa onipa ba no ho nyinaa bɛba mu.
Na wɔbɛyi no ahyɛ wiase aman sofoɔ nsa, na wɔagoro ne ho, na wɔabɔ no adapaa, na wɔatete ntasuo agu ne so,
na wɔaka no mpire, na wɔakum no, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wasɔre bio.

verse.content: Na wɔn deɛ, wɔante yeinom biara ase, na asɛm yi ahunta wɔn, na wɔanhunu deɛ ɔkaeɛ no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔrebɛn Yeriko no, na onifirani bi te kwankyɛn resrɛsrɛ adeɛ.
Na ɔtee sɛ nkurɔfokuo bi retwam no, ɔbisaa aseɛ.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, Yesu Nasareni no na ɔretwam.
Na ɔteaa mu sɛ: Yesu, Dawid ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!
Na wɔn a wɔdi kan no kaa n’anim sɛ ɔmmua n’ano; nanso ɔkɔɔ so teateaa mu denden sɛ: Dawid ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!
Na Yesu gyina hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfa no mmrɛ no. Na ɔbɛneeɛ no, ɔbisaa no
sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ mema woɔ?

verse.content: Na ɔkaa sɛ: Awurade, ma menhunu adeɛ.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Hunu adeɛ! Wo gyidie agye wo.

verse.content: Na amonom hɔ ara, ɔhunuu adeɛ, na ɔdii n’akyi de animuonyam maa Onyankopɔn. Na ɔman no nyinaa hunuiɛ no, wɔde ayeyie maa Onyankopɔn.
Na Yesu kɔhyɛnee Yeriko sɛ ɔretwam.
Na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Sakeo a ɔyɛ togyeni panin na ɔyɛ ɔdefoɔ.
Na ɔrehwehwɛ Yesu ahunu ne nipaban, nanso nkurɔfokuo no nti ɔntumi, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ akwatia.
Na ɔtutuu mmirika dii kan kɔforoo akyee dua bi sɛ ɔrekɔhwɛ no; ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ na ɔrebɛfa.
Na Yesu duruu hɔ no, ɔmaa n’ani so hunuu no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Sakeo, yɛ ntɛm si fam! Na wo fie na ɛsɛ sɛ metena nnɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔyɛɛ ntɛm sii fam, na ɔde anigyeɛ bɛgyee no.
Na nkurɔfokuo no hunuiɛ no, wɔn nyinaa nwiinwii kaa sɛ: Ɔrekɔ akɔsoɛ ɔbarima a ɔyɛ debɔneyɛni.
Na Sakeo gyina ka kyerɛɛ Awurade sɛ: Ao, Awurade, mede m’ahodeɛ fa mekyɛ ahiafoɔ, na sɛ menam nkontompo so magye obi biribi a, mebɔ ho mprɛnnan metua ka.
Na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Ampa ara, ɛnnɛ na nkwagyeɛ aba fie yi mu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno nso yɛ Abraham ba.
Na Onipa Ba no baa sɛ ɔrebɛhwehwɛ na wabɛgye deɛ ayera.

verse.content: Na wɔretie yeinom no, ɔtoaa so buu bɛ bi, ɛfiri sɛ na wabɛn Yerusalem, na nkurɔfokuo no susuu sɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie rebɛyi ne ho adi amonom hɔ ara. Enti Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔdehyeɛ bi kɔɔ asase bi so akyirikyiri, sɛ ɔrekɔgye n’ahennie na wasane aba.
Na ɔfrɛɛ ne nkoa mu du de mmɛnnaa
du maa wɔn; na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monyɛ ho adwuma nkɔsi sɛ mɛba.
Na ne manfoɔ tane no, na wɔsomaa abɔfoɔ dii n’akyiri sɛ: Yɛmpɛ sɛ oyi di yɛn so hene.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔnyaa ahennie no na ɔsane baeɛ no, ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfrɛ ne nkoa a ɔde sika no maa wɔn no mmrɛ no, na ɔnhunu deɛ obiara adi dwa anya.
Na deɛ ɔdi kan no ba bɛkaa sɛ: Owura, wo bɛnnaa no awo mmɛnnaa du aka ho.
Na ɔsee no sɛ: Wiɛ, akoa pa, sɛ woadi ketewa mu nokorɛ nti, di nkuro du so tumi!
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no ba bɛkaa sɛ: Owura, wo bɛnnaa no awo mmɛnnaa nnum.
Na ɔsee oyi nso sɛ: Wo nso di nkuro nnum so!
Na ɔfoforɔ no ba bɛkaa sɛ: Owura, hwɛ, wo bɛnnaa a mede mehyɛɛ duku mu no nie.
Na mesuroo wo, ɛfiri sɛ woyɛ onipa a woyɛ den, wofa deɛ womfa ntoo hɔ, na wotwa deɛ wonguiɛ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Akoa bɔne, wo ara w’anom asɛm so na menam mɛbu wo atɛn. Wonim sɛ meyɛ onipa a meyɛ den a mefa deɛ memfa mentoo hɔ, na metwa deɛ menguiɛ,
na adɛn nti na woamfa me sika no ankɔto sikakorabea, na meba a, mabɛgye m’adeɛ ne ɛho nsiho?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔgyina nkyɛn no sɛ: Monnye ne nsam bɛnnaa no, na momfa nkɔma deɛ ɔwɔ mmɛnnaa du no.
(Na wɔsee no sɛ: Owura, ɔwɔ mmɛnnaa du!)
Na mese mo sɛ: Obiara a ɔwɔ no wɔbɛma no; na deɛ ɔnnie no, deɛ ɔwɔ mpo, wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam.
Na m’atamfoɔ a wɔmpɛ sɛ medi wɔn so hene no deɛ, momfa wɔn mmra ha, na mommɛkum wɔn m’anim!

verse.content: Na ɔwiee yeinom ka no, ɔsene dii kan sɛ ɔrekɔ Yerusalem.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔbɛnee Betfage ne Betania bepɔ a wɔfrɛ no Ngo Bepɔ ho no, ɔsomaa n’asuafoɔ no mu baanu
sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ akuraa a ɛda mo anim yi ase, na mohyɛne hɔ a, mobɛhunu afunumu ba a wɔasa no homa a onipa biara ntenaa ne so da; monsane no mmra ha!
Na sɛ obi bisa mo sɛ: Ɛdeɛn nti na moresane no a, monka sɛ: Ne ho hia Awurade.

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn no kɔe, kɔhunuu sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no ara.
Na wɔresane afunumu ba no no, ne wuranom bisaa wɔn sɛ: Adɛn na moresane afunumu ba no?
Na wɔkaa sɛ: Ne ho hia Awurade.
Na wɔde afunumu ba no brɛɛ Yesu; na wɔde wɔn ntoma guu no so, na wɔde Yesu tenaa so.
Na ɔrekorɔ no, wɔde wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ kwan mu.
Na ɔbɛnee deɛ wɔrebɛsiane Ngo Bepɔ no, asuafoɔ dɔm no nyinaa ani firii aseɛ gyee, na wɔde nne kɛseɛ yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ wɔ ahoɔdenneɛ a wɔahunu nyinaa nti
sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne ɔhene
a ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!
Asomdwoeɛ wɔ soro,
na animuonyam wɔ sorosoro nohoa!

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no mu bi a wɔwɔ nkurɔfokuo no mu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ka w’asuafoɔ no anim!
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mese mo sɛ: Yeinom mua wɔn ano a, anka aboɔ mpo bɛteam.

verse.content: Na ɔbɛneeɛ no, ɔhwɛɛ kuro no suu wɔ so sɛ:

wj.content: Wo ara nso mpo, ɛnnɛ sɛ wo ankasa wonim deɛ ɛfa asomdwoeɛ ho a, anka ɛyɛ. Nanso afei, wɔde ahunta wo.
Na nna bi bɛba wo so a w’atamfo bɛbɔ wo ho pie, na wɔatwa wo ho kɔntɔnkrɔn, na wɔaka wo ahyɛ mu baabiara,
na wɔadwiri wo ne wo mma a wɔwɔ wo mu no agu fam, na wɔrennya wo mu boɔ ɔboɔ so, ɛfiri sɛ woanhunu berɛ a wɔdom bɛhwɛɛ woɔ no.

verse.content: Na Yesu kɔɔ asɔrefie no, ɔfirii aseɛ pamm wɔn a wɔtɔn adeɛ wɔ hɔ no
see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Me fie yɛ mpaebɔ fie;
na mo deɛ, mode ayɛ adwotwafoɔ bɔn.

verse.content: Na daa ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ asɔrefie hɔ; na na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ ne ɔman no mu atitire rehwehwɛ no aku no.
Na wɔanhunu deɛ wɔbɛyɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ɔman no nyinaa de wɔn ho bataa ne ho tiee no.

note.content: Na yei yɛ ɔpaani bosome mmiɛnsa akatua.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ da koro bi a ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ ɔman no wɔ asɔrefie, na ɔreka asɛmpa no, asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ no baa ne so,
na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ka tumi ko a wode yɛ nnoɔma yi kyerɛ yɛn, anaasɛ hwan na ɔmaa wo tumi yi?
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me nso mɛbisa mo asɛm baako na monka nkyerɛ me:
Yohane asubɔ no, ɛfiri soro anaasɛ ɛfiri nnipa?

verse.content: Na wɔdwendwenee sesee wɔn ho sɛ: Sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛfiri soro a, ɔbɛka sɛ: Ɛnneɛ adɛn nti na moannye no annie?
Na sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛfiri nnipa a, ɔman no nyinaa bɛsi yɛn aboɔ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔgye di ampa sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifoɔ.
Na wɔbuaa sɛ, wɔnnim deɛ ɛfire.
Na Yesu nso see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me nso menka tumi ko a mede meyɛ yeinom menkyerɛ mo.

verse.content: Na ɔfirii aseɛ buu ɔman no bɛ yi sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa bi yɛɛ bobe turo, na ɔde fɛmm akuafoɔ bi, na ɔgyaa hɔ kɔɔ baabi kɔkyɛree.
Na berɛ no duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa akoa bi kɔɔ akuafoɔ no nkyɛn sɛ wɔmma no bobe turo no mu aba no bi; na akuafoɔ no hwee no maa no nam nsansa kɔe.
Na ɔsane somaa akoa foforɔ; na ɔno nso wɔhwee no bɔɔ no adapaa maa no nam nsansa kɔe.
Na ɔsomaa deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa; na ɔno nso, wɔpirapiraa no pamm no firii hɔ.
Na bobe turo wura no kaa sɛ: Menyɛ dɛn? Mɛsoma me dɔba; ebia wɔbɛfɛre no.
Na akuafoɔ no hunuu no no, wɔdwendwenee sesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɔdedifoɔ no nie; momma yɛnkum no, na apɛgyadeɛ no nyɛ yɛn dea.
Na wɔtwee no firii bobe turom hɔ kɔkumm no. Enti ɛdeɛn na bobe turo wura no bɛyɛ wɔn?
Ɔbɛba abɛsɛe akuafoɔ yi, na ɔde bobe turo no ama afoforɔ.

verse.content: Na wɔteeɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Onyame mpa ngu!
Na ɔhwɛɛ wɔn anim kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Na ɛdeɛn ne yei a wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Ɔboɔ a abantofoɔ apoɔ no,
ɛno na abɛyɛ tweaso tiboɔ.
Obiara a ɔbɛhwe ɔboɔ no soɔ no, ɔbɛbubu; na deɛ ɛbɛhwe ne soɔ no, ɛbɛpɛkyɛ no.

verse.content: Na Atwerɛfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa kɔsɔ ne mu kye no dɔn no ara mu, nanso wɔsuroo ɔman no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔhunuu sɛ ɛbɛ a ɔbuiɛ no, ɔne wɔn.
Na wɔtɛɛ no, na wɔsomaa nsrafoɔ bi a wɔpatu yɛɛ wɔn anim sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ nnipa tenenee, sɛ wɔnkɔpɛ no asɛm, na wɔayi no ahyɛ amrado mmara ne ne tumi nsa.
Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛnim sɛ wokasa na wokyerɛkyerɛ yie nanso womfɛre obiara anim, na wokyerɛkyerɛ Nyankopɔn kwan nokorɛ mu.
Yɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ yɛyi toɔ ma Kaesare anaasɛ yɛnnyi?
Na ɔhunuu wɔn adwemmɔne no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momfa denare mmɛkyerɛ me! Hwan mfonini ne atwerɛ na ɛwɔ soɔ yi?

verse.content: Na wɔkaa sɛ: Kaesare deɛ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnneɛ momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare ne Nyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn.

verse.content: Na wɔantumi annya n’asɛm bi ansɔ mu ɔman no anim, na ne mmuaeɛ no yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa, na wɔmuaa wɔn ano.
Na Sadukifoɔ a wɔka sɛ owusɔreɛ nni hɔ no mu bi ba bɛbisaa no
sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, Mose twerɛ maa yɛn sɛ: Sɛ obi nua wu, na ɔwɔ yere, na wanwo mma a, ne nua no mfa ne yere no nware, na ɔnwo mma mma deɛ wawuo no.
Nso anuanom baason tenaa ase. Na deɛ ɔdi kan waree yere, wannya ba, na ɔwuiɛ.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu
ne deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa waree no; na saa ara na wɔn baason nyinaa waree no, na wɔannya mma, na wɔwuwui.
Na akyire yi no, ɔbaa no nso wui.
Na afei owusɔreɛ mu no, ɔbɛyɛ wɔn mu hwan yere? Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn baason no aware no.
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wiase yi mma ware, na wɔde wɔn ma awadeɛ;
na wɔn a wɔbɛbu wɔn sɛ ɛsɛ wɔn sɛ wɔn nsa bɛka wiase foforɔ no ne ɔsɔreɛ a wɔbɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu no deɛ, wɔnware, nso wɔmfa wɔn mma awadeɛ.
Nso wɔntumi nwu bio; na wɔte sɛ abɔfoɔ, na wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn mma, sɛ wɔyɛ owunyane mma ntira.
Na ɛfa awufoɔ nyaneeɛ ho deɛ, Mose nso kyerɛɛ wɔ wura no ho asɛm no mu, sɛ ɔfrɛ Awurade sɛ: Abraham Nyankopɔn ne Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Na ɔnyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn, na mmom ateasefoɔ deɛ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa te ase ma no.

verse.content: Na Atwerɛfoɔ no mu bi buaa sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, woaka no yie.
Na yei akyiri no, wɔantumi ammisa no asɛm bi bio.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na wɔka sɛ: Kristo no yɛ Dawid ba?
Na Dawid no ara ka no Nnwom nwoma no mu sɛ:
Awurade see me wura sɛ:
Tena me nifa
kɔsi sɛ mede w’atamfo bɛyɛ wo nan ase ntiasoɔ.
Sɛ Dawid frɛ no owura a, na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɔyɛ ne ba?

verse.content: Na ɔman no nyinaa retie no, na ɔsee asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ mo ho yie Atwerɛfoɔ a wɔpɛ ntadeɛ atentene mu nanteɛ, na wɔpɛ edwa mu nkyea ne mpanimfoɔ nkonnwa hyia adan mu, ne mpanimfoɔ tenabea adidie ase no ho;
wɔn na wɔbɔ akunafoɔ apoo, nanso wɔboapa bɔ mpaeɛ atentene kyerɛ. Yeinom na wɔbɛnya afobuo a ɛso.

verse.content: Na ɔmaa n’ani so hunuu adefoɔ a wɔde wɔn ayɛyɛdeɛ regu ɛtoɔ adaka no mu.
Na ɔhunuu ɔbaa kunafoɔ hiani bi nso a ɔde mpɛsewa mmienu bɛguu mu.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, okunafoɔ hiani yi de bebree abɛgu mu sene wɔn nyinaa.
Na yeinom nyinaa firi deɛ wɔwɔ na aboro wɔn soɔ no mu na wɔde bi abɛgu mu, nanso oyi deɛ, ɔfiri ne hia mu de n’asetenadeɛ a ɔwɔ nyinaa na abɛgu mu.

verse.content: Na ebinom reka asɔrefie no ho asɛm sɛdeɛ wɔde abo fɛfɛ ne akyɛdeɛ hodoɔ ahyehyɛ no no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nnoɔma a mohunu yi deɛ, nna bi bɛba a wɔrennya ɔboɔ wɔ ɔboɔ so wɔ emu a wɔrennwiri ngu fam.

verse.content: Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, da bɛn na yeinom bɛba, na yeinom rebɛba a, ɛho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne sɛn?
Na ɔse:

wj.content: Monhwɛ na wɔannaadaa mo, na nnipa bebree bɛba me din mu abɛka sɛ: Mene no, na, Ɛberɛ no abɛn. Na enti monnni wɔn akyi!
Na sɛ mote ɔko ne basabasayɛ a, mommma no mmɔ mo hu; na ɛtwa sɛ yeinom ba kane; nanso awieeɛ no deɛ, na ɛnnurui.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔman bɛsɔre ɔman so ne ahennie ahennie so.
Na asasewosoɔ kɛseɛ bɛba mmeammea, na ɛkɔm ne yaredɔm bɛba; na ahudeɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ akɛseɛ bɛfiri soro aba.
Na deɛ ɛdi yeinom nyinaa kan ne sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa bɛsɔ mo mu, na wɔataa mo, na wɔayi mo akɔ hyia adan mu ne afiase, na wɔde mo akɔ ahemfo ne amradofoɔ anim me din nti,
na mode adi me ho adanseɛ.
Enti momfa nto mo tirim na moannwene deɛ mode bɛyi mo ho ano ansa.
Na me na mɛma mo ano ne nyansa a mo atamfoɔ nyinaa rentumi ntua ano na wɔrennyina anim.
Na awofoɔ ne anuanom ne abusuafoɔ ne nnamfo nso bɛyi mo ama, na wɔama wɔakum mo mu binom.
Na me din nti nnipa nyinaa bɛtane mo.
Na mo tirinwi mu biara mpo renyera.
Mo boasetɔ mu na mobɛnya mo kra.
Na sɛ mohunu sɛ dɔm atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia a, ɛnneɛ monhunu sɛ ne sɛeɛ abɛn.
Ɛnna momma wɔn a wɔwɔ Yudea nnwane nkɔ mmepɔ soɔ, na wɔn a wɔwɔ Yerusalem mfiri mu nkɔ, na wɔn a wɔwɔ nkuraa no, mommma wɔnnkɔ mu,
ɛfiri sɛ yei ne aweretɔ nna, na nnoɔma a wɔatwerɛ no nyinaa aba mu.
Na wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔma nufoɔ nna no mu no nnue! Na ahohia kɛseɛ bɛba asase no so, na abufuo bɛda ɔman yi so.
Na wɔbɛtotɔ nkrantɛ ano, na wɔafa wɔn nnommum akɔ amanaman nyinaa so. Na wiase amanaman bɛtiatia Yerusalem so de akɔsi sɛ amanaman no berɛ bɛwie duro.
Na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bɛba owia ne ɔsrane ne nsoromma mu, na amanaman ho bɛyera wɔn asase so, ɛpo ne asorɔkyeɛ a ɛrehuro no nti;
na ehu ne nnoɔma a wɔhwɛ a ɛreba wiase no bɛma nnipa atotɔ bera; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛwoso ɔsoro ahoɔden.
Ɛnna wɔbɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔde tumi ne animuonyam kɛseɛ reba mununkum mu.
Na nnoɔma yi refiri aseɛ aba a, monhwɛ soro na momma mo tiri so, ɛfiri sɛ mo gyeɛ rebɛn.

verse.content: Na ɔbuu wɔn bɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ borɔdɔma ne nnua nyinaa!
Sɛ ɛnya fefɛ na mohwɛ a, mo ankasa mohunu sɛ ahuhuro berɛ anya abɛn.
Saa ara na mo nso, sɛ mohunu sɛ yeinom reba a, monhunu sɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie abɛn.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ yi rentwam, gye sɛ ne nyinaa aba mu ansa.
Ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam, na me nsɛm deɛ, ɛrentwam da.
Na monhwɛ mo ho yie, na adidie mmorosoɔ ne nsaborɔ ne nkwa yi mu nnoɔma ho dadwene ne haw anhyɛ mo akoma so, na ɛda no ammɛto mo mpofirim sɛ fidie,
na ɛbɛba wɔn a wɔte asase ani nyinaa so.
Enti monwɛn na monsrɛ daa, na moanya ahoɔden de adwane afiri nnoɔma a ɛrebɛba yi nyinaa mu, na moakɔgyina Onipa Ba no anim.

verse.content: Nso da biara no, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ asɔrefie hɔ awia, na anadwo na wafiri hɔ akɔtena bepɔ a wɔfrɛ no Ngo Bepɔ no so.
Na ɔman no nyinaa tua anɔpa ba ne nkyɛn asɔrefie hɔ bɛtie no.
Na Apiti afahyɛ a wɔfrɛ no Twam no bɛnee.
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no hwehwɛɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛyɛ na wɔakum Yesu; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔsuro ɔman no.
Na Satan kɔhyɛnee Yuda a wɔfrɛ no Iskariot a ɔyɛ dummienu no mu baako no mu.
Na ɔne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asafohene no kɔkasa kyerɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔbɛyɛ na wayi no ama wɔn.
Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn anigyeɛ, na wɔne no hyehyɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛma no sika bi.
Na ɔpenee; na ɔhwehwɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔbɛnya kwan ayi no ama wɔn wɔ nkurɔfokuo no akyi.
Na afei Apiti da a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkum Twam dwan no durui.
Na Yesu somaa Petro ne Yohane sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ nkɔsiesie Twam no mma yɛn, na yɛmmɛdi.

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔsiesie?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, moduru kuro no mu a, onipa bi a ɔso ahina a nsuo wɔ mu bɛhyia mo; monni n’akyi nkɔ efie a ɔbɛkɔ mu no mu.
Na monse efiewura no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ se wo sɛ: Ɛhe na ahɔhodan a me ne m’asuafoɔ bɛdi mu Twam no wɔ?
Na ɔbɛkyerɛ mo abansoro asa kɛseɛ bi a wɔahyehyɛ mu; ɛhɔ na monkɔsiesie!

verse.content: Na wɔkɔ kɔhunuu sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na wɔsiesiee Twam no.
Na dɔn no duruiɛ no, ɔbɛtenaa ase, na asomafoɔ no ka ne ho.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Pɛ na mepɛɛ sɛ me ne mo di Twam yi ansa na mahunu amane.
Na mese mo sɛ, merenni bi bio, gye da a aba mu Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.

verse.content: Na ɔfaa kuruwa no daa ase, na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnye yei, na monkyɛ mu!
Na mese mo sɛ, merennom bobe aba no bi bio, gye da a Nyankopɔn ahennie no bɛba.

verse.content: Na ɔfaa paanoo daa ase bubui, na ɔde maa wɔn kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Yei ne me honam a mo nti wɔde rema; monyɛ yei mfa nyɛ me nkaeɛ.

verse.content: Saa ara nso na wɔwiee adidie no, ɔfaa kuruwa no kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Kuruwa yi ne apam foforɔ me mogya mu, ɛno na mo nti wɔrehwie aguo.
Nso hwɛ, deɛ ɔreyi me ama no ne me te pono ho didi.
Na Onipa Ba no rekɔ sɛdeɛ wɔahyɛ no deɛ, nanso onipa a ɔbɛyi no ama no nnue!

verse.content: Na wɔfirii aseɛ bisabisaa wɔ wɔn mu sɛ, hwan ara na ɔrebɛyɛ saa adeɛ yi.
Na akasakasa bi nso baa wɔn mu sɛ, wɔn mu hwan na wɔbɛbu no kɛseɛ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wiase amanaman ahemfo di wɔn so ahensɛm, na wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so tumi no, wɔfrɛ wɔn adɛɛfoɔ.
Na mo deɛ, monnyɛ saa, na mmom deɛ ɔyɛ mo mu kɛseɛ no, ɔnyɛ sɛ akumaa; na deɛ ɔyɛ otitire no nyɛ sɛ deɛ ɔsom.
Na hwan na ɔso, deɛ ɔte aduane pono ho anaasɛ deɛ ɔsom? Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔte aduane pono ho? Na me deɛ, mewɔ mo mu sɛ deɛ ɔsom.
Na mone wɔn a wɔda so ka me ho wɔ me sɔhwɛ mu.
Na me nso, sɛdeɛ m’agya ayi ahennie ama me no, saa ara na mayi mama mo,
na moadidi na moanom me pono so wɔ m’ahennie mu, na moatena nhennwa so abu Israel mmusuakuo dummienu no atɛn.
Simon, Simon, hwɛ, anka na Satan pɛ sɛ ɔnya mo na ɔhuhu mo so sɛ aburoo.
Nanso masrɛ mama wo, na woampa wo gyidie. Na wo deɛ, sɛ daakye, sɛ wosan gyina a, hyɛ wo nuanom den!

verse.content: Na ɔsee no sɛ: Awurade, masiesie me ho sɛ me ne wo bɛkɔ afiase ne owuo mu.
Na ɔse:

wj.content: Petro, meka mekyerɛ wo, ɛnnɛ, ansa na akokɔ bɛbɔn no, na woasane mprɛnsa sɛ wonnim me.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mesomaa mo a na monkura sika kotokuo ne akwantuo bɔtɔ ne mpaboa no, biribi ho hiaa mo anaa?

verse.content: Na wɔse: Anhia yɛn hwee.
Ɛnna ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Afei deɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ sika kotokuo no, ma no mfa, ne akwantuo bɔtɔ saa ara; na deɛ ɔnni bie no, ma no ntɔn ne ntoma mfa ntɔ nkrantɛ.
Na mese mo sɛ, yei a wɔatwerɛ nso, ɛtwa sɛ ɛba mu wɔ me ho sɛ: Wɔakan no afra mmaratofoɔ mu. Na deɛ ɛfa me ho no wɔ awieeɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔse: Awurade, hwɛ, nkrantɛ mmienu ni. Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdɔɔso.

verse.content: Na ɔfirii adi, na sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ daa no, ɔkɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so; na asuafoɔ no nso dii n’akyi.
Na ɔduruu hɔ no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu!

verse.content: Na ɔtwee ne ho firii wɔn nkyɛn bɛyɛ sɛ deɛ wɔto ɔboɔ a, ɛbɛtɔ no, ɔkotoo ne nan anim bɔɔ mpaeɛ
sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, sɛ wopɛ a, ma kuruwa yi nsiane me ho nkɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ deɛ mepɛ, na deɛ wopɛ na ɛnyɛ hɔ.

verse.content: Na ɔbɔfoɔ firii soro bɛyii ne ho kyerɛɛ no hyɛɛ no den.
Na ɔwɔ owuo yea mu no, ɔmaa ne mpaebɔ mu yɛɛ den. Na ne ho fifire yɛɛ sɛ mogya ntowantowa a ɛsosɔ fam.
Na ɔsɔre firii mpaebɔ mu baa asuafoɔ no nkyɛn no, ɔbɛhunuu wɔn sɛ awerɛhoɔ nti wɔadeda,
na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na moreda? Monsɔre mmɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.

verse.content: Na ɔgu so rekasa no, hwɛ, nnipakuo bi bae a dummienu no mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Yuda di wɔn anim. Na ɔtwe bɛnee Yesu, bɛfee n’ano.
Na Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Yuda, wode mfeano na ɛreyi onipa ba no ama?

verse.content: Na wɔn a wɔwɔ ne ho no hunuu deɛ ɛrebɛba no, wɔbisaa no sɛ: Awurade, yɛmmobɔ wɔn nkrantɛ anaa?
Na wɔn mu baako bɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin akoa, na ɔtwaa n’aso nifa.
Na Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Momma no nso ha ara!

verse.content: Na ɔsɔɔ n’aso no mu de famm hɔ.
Na afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asɔrefie asafohene ne mpanimfoɔ a wɔbaa ne soɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Mobaa sɛdeɛ moreba odwotwafoɔ soɔ na mokura nkrantɛ ne mmaa yi?
Me ne mo wɔ asɔrefie hɔ daa no, moankye me; na yei ne mo berɛ ne esum tumi.

verse.content: Na wɔkyere no kɔe, na wɔde no kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin fie. Na Petro deɛ, ɔdii wɔn akyi wɔ akyirikyiri.
Na wɔsɔɔ ogya adihɔ hɔ na wɔtenaa ho no, Petro bɛtenaa wɔn mu.
Na abaawa bi hunuu no sɛ ɔte gya no ho, na ɔhwɛɛ no dinn kaa sɛ: Oyi nso ne no na ɛnam.
Na ɔsanee sɛ: Ɔbaa, menni no.
Na ankyɛ na ɔfoforɔ hunuu no, na ɔse: Wo nso wofiri wɔn mu. Na Petro se: Barima, memfiri wɔn mu.
Na ɛno akyi bɛyɛ dɔnhwere baako no, ɔfoforɔ bi nso de bɛtoo so sɛ: Oyi nso ne no na ɛnam ampa, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ Galileani.
Na Petro se: Barima, mennim deɛ woreka yi. Na amonom hɔ ara a ɔgu so rekasa no, akokɔ bɔnee.
Na Awurade danee ne ho hwɛɛ Petro anim; na Petro kaee Awurade asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnnɛ, akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa no.

verse.content: Na Petro firii adi kɔsuu yayaaya.
Na mmarima a wɔkura Yesu no goroo ne ho hwee no.
Na wɔkataa n’ani bobɔɔ n’ani so, na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Hyɛ nkɔm! Hwan na ɔbɔɔ woɔ?
Na abususɛm pii keka ho a wɔka guu ne soɔ.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔman mpanimfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no bɛhyiaeɛ, na wɔde no kɔɔ wɔn asɛnniiɛ
kaa sɛ: Wone Kristo no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn! Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ mese mo a, morennye nni;
na sɛ nso mebisa mo a, moremmua me.
Na ɛfiri nnɛ na Onipa Ba no bɛtena Nyankopɔn tumi nifa soɔ.

verse.content: Na wɔn nyinaa kaa sɛ: Ɛnneɛ na wone Nyankopɔn ba no anaa? Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Moaka, na mene no.

verse.content: Na wɔse: Adanseɛ bɛn na ɛhia yɛn bio? Na yɛn ara yɛate afiri n’anomu.
Ɛnna nnipakuo no nyinaa sɔre de no kɔɔ Pilato anim.
Na wɔfirii aseɛ totoo n’ano sɛ: Yɛahunu sɛ onipa yi resɛe yɛn man, na wabara sɛ wɔnnyi toɔ mma Kaesare, na ɔka sɛ ɔno ara ne Ɔhene Kristo no.
Na Pilato bisaa no sɛ: Wone Yudafoɔ hene no anaa? Na ɔbuaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Woaka.

verse.content: Na Pilato ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no sɛ: Menhunu afobusɛm biara onipa yi mu.
Nanso wɔkae ara sɛ: Ɔhwanyan ɔman mu, ɔkyerɛkyerɛ Yudea man nyinaa mu, ɔfirii aseɛ Galilea na ɔde abɛduru ha yi.
Na Pilato tee Galilea din no, ɔbisaa sɛ onipa no yɛ Galileani anaa?
Na ɔhunuu sɛ ɔfiri Herode asase soɔ no, ɔmaa wɔde no kɔmaa Herode; na nna no mu no, na ɔno ara nso wɔ Yerusalem.
Herode hunuu Yesu no, n’ani gyee sɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔhu no akyɛ, na wate ne ho nsɛm ntira. Na n’ani da so sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi na wahunu.
Na ɔbisabisaa no nsɛm bebree, nanso wammua no.
Nso na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no gyina hɔ, na wɔtotoo n’ano ara.
Na Herode ne ne dɔm no bɔɔ no adapaa, goroo ne ho, na ɔhyɛɛ no atadeɛ nahanaha bi de no kɔmaa Pilato bio.
Na da no ara na Herode ne Pilato faa adamfoɔ; akane no deɛ, na anka wɔyɛ aka.
Na Pilato frɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ ne ɔman no boaa ano
ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Mode onipa yi abrɛ me sɛ obi a ɔsɛe ɔman; na hwɛ, mahwehwɛ ne mu mo anim, na manhunu nsɛm a mode totoo n’anomu afobusɛm biara onipa yi mu.
Herode nso anhunu; na ɔmaa wɔde no brɛɛ yɛn, na hwɛ, ɔnyɛɛ deɛ ɛfata sɛ wɔku no.
Enti mɛhwe no, na magyaa no.
[Nso ɛsɛ no sɛ daa, afahyɛ no mu, ɔgyaa odeduani baako ma wɔn.]
Na wɔn nyinaa teaa mu prɛko sɛ: Fa oyi kɔ, na gyae Baraba ma yɛn!
(Ɔno na sakasaka bi a ɔkɔyɛɛ no kuro mu hɔ ne awudie nti wɔde no akɔto afiase.)
Na Pilato pɛɛ sɛ ɔgyaa Yesu nti, ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn bio.
Na wɔteaa mu sɛ: Bɔ no asɛnnua mu, bɔ no asɛnnua mu!
Na ɔkaa deɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Na bɔne bɛn na wayɛ? Manhunu adeɛ biara a wayɛ a ɛfata sɛ wɔku no, enti mɛhwe no, na magyaa no.
Na wɔde nne kɛseɛ kɔɔ so bisaa sɛ wɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu; na wɔn nne boroo ne deɛ so.
Na Pilato buu atɛn sɛ ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbisaeɛ no.
Na ɔgyaee deɛ sakasaka ne awudie nti wɔde no kɔtoo afiase a wɔsrɛɛ no no maa wɔn, na Yesu deɛ, ɔyii no mae sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ.
Na wɔde no rekorɔ no, wɔsɔɔ Simon bi a ɔfiri Kirene a ɔfiri afuom reba no mu, na wɔde asɛnnua no too ne so sɛ ɔnsoa nni Yesu akyi.
Na ɔman no mu nnipakuo kɛseɛ dii n’akyi ne mmaa a wɔredi abooboo na wɔresu no.
Na Yesu danee n’ani kyerɛɛ wɔn kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Yerusalem mmammaa, monnsu me, na monsu mo ho ne mo mma!
Na hwɛ, nna bi reba a wɔbɛka sɛ: Nhyira ne abonini ne yafunu a ɛnwoo da ne nufoɔ a wɔnnum da.
Ɛnna wɔbɛfiri aseɛ aka akyerɛ mmepɔ sɛ: Monhwe yɛn so! ne nkokoɔ sɛ: Monkata yɛn so!
Na sɛ wɔde yei reyɛ dua mono a, ɛdeɛn na wɔde bɛyɛ dua wuiɛ?

verse.content: Na wɔde nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu nso kaa ne ho kɔɔ sɛ wɔnkɔkum wɔn.
Na wɔduruu baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Tikwankoraa bea no, ɛhɔ na wɔsɛnee no ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ no, ɔbaako wɔ ne nifa, na ɔbaako wɔ benkum.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, fa kyɛ wɔn, na wɔnnim deɛ wɔreyɛ!

verse.content: Na wɔtwee ntonto de kyɛɛ ne ntoma mu.
Na ɔman no gyina hɔ rehwɛ. Na mpanimfoɔ no nso yii no ahi sɛ: Ɔgyee binom; sɛ oyi ne Kristo no a Onyankopɔn ayi no no a, ma no nnye ne ho ɛ!
Na asraafoɔ no nso goroo ne ho, na wɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛmaa no nsa kekakeka,
na wɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ woyɛ Yudafoɔ hene a, gye wo ho!
Na atwerɛ bi nso wɔ n’atifi sɛ: Oyi ne Yudafoɔ hene.
Na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ a wɔasɛne wɔn no mu baako yaa no sɛ: Ɛnyɛ wo ne Kristo no? Gye wo ho ne yɛn!
Na ɔbaako no buaa no kaa n’anim sɛ: Wo nso wonnsuro Onyankopɔn sɛ wowɔ afobuo koro yi ara mu yi?
Na yɛn deɛ, deɛ ɛtene pɛpɛɛpɛ, na yɛanya deɛ ɛsɛ yɛn nneyɛɛ no; na oyi deɛ, ɔnyɛɛ mfomsoɔ adeɛ biara.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Yesu, sɛ woba w’ahennie mu a, kae me!
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese wo sɛ, nnɛ wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise hɔ.

verse.content: Na ɛbɛyɛ awia dummienu no, esum duruu asase nyinaa so de kɔsii awia nnɔnmmiɛnsa.
Na owia duruu sum; na asɔredan mu ntoma a ɛtwa mfimfini no mu teeɛ.
Na Yesu de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ!

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔgyaa mu.
Na asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no hunuu deɛ asie no, ɔhyɛɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam sɛ: Ampa ara, onipa yi yɛ onipa tenenee.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo a wɔbaa hɔ bɛhwɛɛ adeɛ no nyinaa hunuu deɛ asie no, wɔbobɔɔ wɔn koko so, sane kɔe.
Na n’amannifoɔ nyinaa ne mmaa a wɔdii n’akyi firi Galilea no abɛgyina akyirikyiri rehwɛ nnoɔma yi.
Na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔyɛ badwani na ɔyɛ onipa pa na ɔtene
no deɛ, wampene wɔn agyina ne wɔn nneyɛɛ no so. Ɔfiri Yudafoɔ kuro Arimatea mu, na ɔno ara nso retwɛn Nyankopɔn ahennie no.
Ɔno na ɔkɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ no Yesu amu no.
Na ɔkɔyii amu no kyekyeree no nwera mu, na ɔde kɔtoo ɛda a wɔatwa no ɔboɔ mu, a onipa bi nnaa mu da mu.
Na da no yɛ ahosiesie da, na homeda rebɛn.
Na mmaa no nso a wɔne no firi Galilea baeɛ no dii akyire kɔhwɛɛ ɛda no ne sɛdeɛ wɔde n’amu no too hɔ faeɛ.
Na wɔsane bɛsiesiee nnuro ne ngo hwamhwam.
Na homeda no, wɔyɛɛ komm homee sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ no.

note.content: Tete Atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu no bi mfa nkyekyɛmu 17 no nka ho.

verse.content: Na da a ɛdi nnawɔtwe kan no anɔpahema, wɔkɔɔ ɛda no so, na wɔde nnuhwam a wɔasiesie no bae.
Na wɔhunuu ɔboɔ no sɛ apire afiri ɛda no ano,
na wɔhyɛnee mu no, wɔanhunu Awurade Yesu amu no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ yei yɛɛ wɔn tirim keserenee no, hwɛ, mmarima baanu bɛgyinaa wɔn nkyɛn a wɔhyɛ ntadeɛ a ɛhyerɛn.
Na ehu kaa wɔn maa wɔsisii wɔn tiri ase, na mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Adɛn na mohwehwɛ ɔteasefoɔ awufoɔ mu yi?
Ɔnni ha, na wasɔre. Monkae sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ Galilea no, ɔka kyerɛɛ mo
sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛtwa sɛ wɔde Onipa Ba no hyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa, na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wasɔre bio.

verse.content: Na wɔkaee ne nsɛm no;
na wɔsane firii ɛda no so bɛkaa nnoɔma yi nyinaa kyerɛɛ dubaako no ne wɔn a aka no nyinaa.
Na Maria Magdalene ne Yohana ne Yakobo ne na Maria ne mmaa a wɔka wɔn ho no na wɔbɛkaa yeinom kyerɛɛ asomafoɔ no.
Nanso wɔn nsɛm no yɛɛ wɔn sɛ nsɛnhunu, na wɔannye wɔn anni.
Na Petro deɛ, ɔsɔre tutuu mmirika kɔɔ ɛda no so, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase hwɛɛ mu no, ɔhunuu nwera no sɛ ɛgu fa, na ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ fie, na deɛ asie no yɛɛ no nwanwa.
Na hwɛ, da no ara wɔn mu baanu sii mu kɔɔ akuraa bi a wɔfrɛ no Emaus a ɛfiri Yerusalem rekɔ hɔ bɛyɛ nkwansimma aduosia ase.
Na wɔredi nsɛm a asie yi nyinaa ho nkɔmmɔ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔredi nkɔmmɔ na wɔrebisabisaa wɔn ho no, Yesu ankasa twe bɛnee ne wɔn bɔɔ anan kɔe.
Nanso wɔasosɔ wɔn aniwa mu, na wanhu no.
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nkɔmmɔ bɛn na monam redie a mo werɛ ahoɔ yi?

verse.content: Na wɔn mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Kleopa buaa no sɛ: Wo nko ne hɔhoɔ wɔ Yerusalem a wonnim nsɛm a asi hɔ nnansa yi anaa?
Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nsɛm bɛn?

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Deɛ ɛfa Nasareni Yesu a ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ a ɔwɔ tumi, nneyɛɛ ne ɔkasa mu, Onyankopɔn ne ɔman nyinaa anim no ho,
sɛdeɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne yɛn mpanimfoɔ de no kɔmaa sɛ wɔmmu no fɔ nkum no, na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na yɛn deɛ, yɛn ani daa so sɛ anka ɔno na ɔrebɛgye Israel. Nanso yei nyinaa akyiri no, nnansa ni a nsɛm yi siiɛ.
Na mmaa bi a wɔfiri yɛn mu abɛma yɛn ho adwiri yɛn. Wɔtuaa nhema kɔɔ ɛda no so,
na wɔanhunu n’amu no, na wɔba bɛkaa sɛ wɔahunu abɔfoɔ bi wɔn ani so nso a wɔkaa sɛ ɔte ase.
Na wɔn a wɔne yɛn wɔ hɔ no mu binom kɔɔ ɛda no so, na wɔkɔhunuu sɛdeɛ mmaa no nso kaeɛ no ara; na ɔno ara deɛ, wɔanhu no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: O adwenharefoɔ a moyɛ nyaa mo akoma mu sɛ mobɛgye deɛ adiyifoɔ no aka nyinaa adie!
Ɛnsɛ sɛ Kristo no bɛhunu saa amaneɛ no ansa na wakɔ n’animuonyam mu anaa?

verse.content: Na ɔfiri Mose ne adiyifoɔ nyinaa so kyerɛɛ wɔn atwerɛ nyinaa mu nsɛm a ɛfa ne ho ase.
Na wɔrebɛn akuraa a wɔrekɔ aseɛ no, ɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔrekɔ n’anim.
Na wɔhyɛɛ no dendeenden sɛ: Tena yɛn nkyɛn, na onwunu adwo, na adeɛ reyɛ asa. Ɛnna ɔhyɛnee mu ne wɔn kɔtenaeɛ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔne wɔn te adidiiɛ no, ɔfaa paanoo hyiraa so, na ɔbubu de maa wɔn.
Na wɔn ani buee, na wɔhunuu no; na ɔno deɛ, ɔtu yeraa wɔ wɔn anim.
Ɛnna wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɔne yɛn rekasa kwan mu na ɔbuee atwerɛ nsɛm no mu kyerɛɛ yɛn no, yɛn akoma mu anyɛ yɛn dɛdɛɛdɛ anaa?
Na wɔsɔree dɔn no ara mu sane baa Yerusalem; na wɔbɛhunuu sɛ dubaako no ne wɔn a wɔka wɔn ho aboaboa wɔn ano
reka sɛ: Awurade anyane ampa, na wayi ne ho akyerɛ Simon.
Na baanu no nso kaa deɛ ɛsii kwan mu ne sɛdeɛ wɔhunuu no paanoobubuo mu no kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na wɔrekasa saa no, ɔno ara ankasa bɛgyinaa wɔn mfimfini, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!

verse.content: Na wɔbobɔɔ binim, na wɔsuro susuu sɛ wɔahunu ɔsaman.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn na mo akoma tutuo, na adɛn nti na adwene sɔresɔre mo akoma mu?
Monhwɛ me nsa ne me nan sɛ ɛyɛ me ara; momfa mo nsa nka me nhwɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsaman nni nam ne nnompe sɛdeɛ mohunu sɛ mewɔ yi.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔde ne nsa ne ne nan kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na anigyeɛ nti wɔda so nnye nni na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mowɔ aduane bi wɔ ha anaa?

verse.content: Na wɔmaa no apataa a wɔatoto sini bi.
Na ɔgye dii wɔ wɔn anim.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yei ne me nsɛm a me ne mo wɔ hɔ no, meka mekyerɛɛ mo no, sɛ ɛtwa sɛ deɛ wɔatwerɛ Mose mmara ne Adiyifoɔ ne Nnwom mu, wɔ me ho no nyinaa ba mu.

verse.content: Ɛno na ɔbuee wɔn adwene mu maa wɔtee atwerɛ nsɛm no aseɛ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ: Kristo no bɛhunu amane, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu,
na wɔafa ne din so akɔka adwensakyera ne bɔne fakyɛ amansan nyinaa mu, na wɔbɛfiri aseɛ wɔ Yerusalem.
Na mone yeinom ho adansefoɔ.
Na hwɛ, meresoma m’agya bɔhyɛ no aba mo so; enti montena kuro no mu nkɔsi sɛ wɔbɛma mo ahoɔden afiri soro.

verse.content: Na ɔde wɔn firii adi kɔduruu Betania; na ɔmaa ne nsa so hyiraa wɔn.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔrehyira wɔn no, ɔne wɔn paepaee mu, na wɔmaa no so kɔɔ soro.
Na wɔkoto sɔree no, na wɔde anigyeɛ kɛseɛ sane baa Yerusalem.
Na wɔwɔ asɔrefie hɔ daa yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
